original: RV_6,024.10c amā cainam araṇye pāhi riṣo madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: amā ca enam araṇye pāhi riṣaḥ madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_6,025.01a yā ta ūtir avamā yā paramā yā madhyamendra śuṣminn asti /
analyzed: yā te ūtiḥ avamā yā paramā yā madhyamā indra śuṣmin asti

original: RV_6,025.01c tābhir ū ṣu vṛtrahatye 'vīr na ebhiś ca vājair mahān na ugra //
analyzed: tābhiḥ u su vṛtra hatye vīḥ naḥ ebhiḥ ca vājaiḥ mahān naḥ ugra

original: RV_6,025.02a ābhi spṛdho mithatīr ariṣaṇyann amitrasya vyathayā manyum indra /
analyzed: ābhiḥ spṛdhaḥ mithatīḥ a riṣaṇyan amitrasya vyathaya manyum indra

original: RV_6,025.02c ābhir viśvā abhiyujo viṣūcīr āryāya viśo 'va tārīr dāsīḥ //
analyzed: ābhiḥ viśvāḥ abhiyujaḥ viṣūcīḥ āryāya viśaḥ vaḥ tārīḥ dāsīḥ

original: RV_6,025.03a indra jāmaya uta ye 'jāmayo 'rvācīnāso vanuṣo yuyujre /
analyzed: indra jāmayaḥ uta ye jāmayaḥ rvācīnāsaḥ vanuṣaḥ yuyujre

original: RV_6,025.03c tvam eṣāṃ vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhī parācaḥ //
analyzed: tvam eṣām vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhi parācaḥ

original: RV_6,025.04a śūro vā śūraṃ vanate śarīrais tanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite /
analyzed: śūraḥ vā śūram vanate śarīraiḥ tanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite

original: RV_6,025.04c toke vā goṣu tanaye yad apsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite //
analyzed: toke vā goṣu tanaye yat apsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite

original: RV_6,025.05a nahi tvā śūro na turo na dhṛṣṇur na tvā yodho manyamāno yuyodha /
analyzed: nahi tvā śūraḥ na turaḥ na dhṛṣṇuḥ na tvā yodhaḥ manyamānaḥ yuyodha

original: RV_6,025.05c indra nakiṣ ṭvā praty asty eṣāṃ viśvā jātāny abhy asi tāni //
analyzed: indra nakir tvā prati asti eṣām viśvā jātāni abhī asi tāni

original: RV_6,025.06a sa patyata ubhayor nṛmṇam ayor yadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante /
analyzed: sa patyate ubhayoḥ nṛmṇam ayoḥ yadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante

original: RV_6,025.06c vṛtre vā maho nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite //
analyzed: vṛtre vā mahaḥ nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite

original: RV_6,025.07a adha smā te carṣaṇayo yad ejān indra trātota bhavā varūtā /
analyzed: adha smā te carṣaṇayaḥ yat ejān indra trātā uta bhava varūtā

original: RV_6,025.07c asmākāso ye nṛtamāso arya indra sūrayo dadhire puro naḥ //
analyzed: asmākāsaḥ ye nṛtamāsaḥ aryaḥ indra sūrayaḥ dadhire puras naḥ

original: RV_6,025.08a anu te dāyi maha indriyāya satrā te viśvam anu vṛtrahatye /
analyzed: anu te dāyi mahe indriyāya satrā te viśvam anu vṛtra hatye

original: RV_6,025.08c anu kṣatram anu saho yajatrendra devebhir anu te nṛṣahye //
analyzed: anu kṣatram anu sahaḥ yajatra indra devebhiḥ anu te nṛṣahye

original: RV_6,025.09a evā na spṛdhaḥ sam ajā samatsv indra rārandhi mithatīr adevīḥ /
analyzed: eva naḥ spṛdhaḥ sam aja samatsu indra rārandhi mithatīḥ adevīḥ

original: RV_6,025.09c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto bharadvājā uta ta indra nūnam //
analyzed: vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ bharadvājāḥ uta te indra nūnam

original: RV_6,026.01a śrudhī na indra hvayāmasi tvā maho vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ /
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ indra hvayāmasi tvā mahaḥ vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_6,026.01c saṃ yad viśo 'yanta śūrasātā ugraṃ no 'vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ //
analyzed: sam yat viśaḥ yanta śūra sātau ugram naḥ vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ

original: RV_6,026.02a tvāṃ vājī havate vājineyo maho vājasya gadhyasya sātau /
analyzed: tvām vājī havate vājineyaḥ mahaḥ vājasya gadhyasya sātau

original: RV_6,026.02c tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ tarutraṃ tvāṃ caṣṭe muṣṭihā goṣu yudhyan //
analyzed: tvām vṛtreṣu indra sat patim tarutram tvām caṣṭe muṣṭi hā goṣu yudhyan

original: RV_6,026.03a tvaṃ kaviṃ codayo 'rkasātau tvaṃ kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ dāśuṣe vark /
analyzed: tvam kavim codayaḥ rka sātau tvam kutsāya śuṣṇam dāśuṣe vark

original: RV_6,026.03c tvaṃ śiro amarmaṇaḥ parāhann atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan //
analyzed: tvam śiraḥ amarmaṇaḥ parāhan atithigvāya śaṃsyam kariṣyan

original: RV_6,026.04a tvaṃ ratham pra bharo yodham ṛṣvam āvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum /
analyzed: tvam ratham pra bharaḥ yodham ṛṣvam āvaḥ yudhyantam vṛṣabham daśadyum

original: RV_6,026.04c tvaṃ tugraṃ vetasave sacāhan tvaṃ tujiṃ gṛṇantam indra tūtoḥ //
analyzed: tvam tugram vetasave sacā ahan tvam tujim gṛṇantam indra tūtoḥ

original: RV_6,026.05a tvaṃ tad uktham indra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yac chatā sahasrā śūra darṣi /
analyzed: tvam tat uktham indra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yat śatā sahasrā śūra darṣi

original: RV_6,026.05c ava girer dāsaṃ śambaraṃ han prāvo divodāsaṃ citrābhir ūtī //
analyzed: ava gireḥ dāsam śambaram han prāvaḥ divodāsam citrābhiḥ ūtī

original: RV_6,026.06a tvaṃ śraddhābhir mandasānaḥ somair dabhītaye cumurim indra siṣvap /
analyzed: tvam śraddhābhiḥ mandasānaḥ somaiḥ dabhītaye cumurim indra siṣvap

original: RV_6,026.06c tvaṃ rajim piṭhīnase daśasyan ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā śacyā sacāhan //
analyzed: tvam rajim piṭhīnase daśasyan ṣaṣṭim sahasrā śacyā sacā ahan

original: RV_6,026.07a ahaṃ cana tat sūribhir ānaśyāṃ tava jyāya indra sumnam ojaḥ /
analyzed: aham cana tat sūribhiḥ ānaśyām tava jyāyaḥ indra sumnam ojaḥ

original: RV_6,026.07c tvayā yat stavante sadhavīra vīrās trivarūthena nahuṣā śaviṣṭha //
analyzed: tvayā yat stavante sadhavīra vīrāḥ tri varūthena nahuṣā śaviṣṭha

original: RV_6,026.08a vayaṃ te asyām indra dyumnahūtau sakhāyaḥ syāma mahina preṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: vayam te asyām indra dyumna hūtau sakhāyaḥ syāma mahina preṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_6,026.08c prātardaniḥ kṣatraśrīr astu śreṣṭho ghane vṛtrāṇāṃ sanaye dhanānām //
analyzed: prātardaniḥ kṣatra śrīḥ astu śreṣṭhaḥ ghane vṛtrāṇām sanaye dhanānām

original: RV_6,027.01a kim asya made kim v asya pītāv indraḥ kim asya sakhye cakāra /
analyzed: kim asya made kim u asya pītau indraḥ kim asya sakhye cakāra

original: RV_6,027.01c raṇā vā ye niṣadi kiṃ te asya purā vividre kim u nūtanāsaḥ //
analyzed: raṇā vā ye niṣadi kim te asya purā vividre kim u nūtanāsaḥ

original: RV_6,027.02a sad asya made sad v asya pītāv indraḥ sad asya sakhye cakāra /
analyzed: sat asya made sat u asya pītau indraḥ sat asya sakhye cakāra

original: RV_6,027.02c raṇā vā ye niṣadi sat te asya purā vividre sad u nūtanāsaḥ //
analyzed: raṇā vā ye niṣadi sat te asya purā vividre sat u nūtanāsaḥ

original: RV_6,027.03a nahi nu te mahimanaḥ samasya na maghavan maghavattvasya vidma /
analyzed: nahi nu te mahimanaḥ samasya na maghavan maghavat tvasya vidma

original: RV_6,027.03c na rādhaso-rādhaso nūtanasyendra nakir dadṛśa indriyaṃ te //
analyzed: na rādhasaḥ rādhasaḥ nūtanasya indra nakir dadṛśe indriyam te

original: RV_6,027.04a etat tyat ta indriyam aceti yenāvadhīr varaśikhasya śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: etat tyad te indriyam aceti yena avadhīḥ varaśikhasya śeṣaḥ

original: RV_6,027.04c vajrasya yat te nihatasya śuṣmāt svanāc cid indra paramo dadāra //
analyzed: vajrasya yat te nihatasya śuṣmāt svanāt cit indra paramaḥ dadāra

original: RV_6,027.05a vadhīd indro varaśikhasya śeṣo 'bhyāvartine cāyamānāya śikṣan /
analyzed: vadhīt indraḥ vara śikhasya śeṣaḥ bhyāvartine cāyamānāya śikṣan

original: RV_6,027.05c vṛcīvato yad dhariyūpīyāyāṃ han pūrve ardhe bhiyasāparo dart //
analyzed: vṛcīvataḥ yat hariyūpīyāyām han pūrve ardhe bhiyasā aparaḥ dart

original: RV_6,027.06a triṃśacchataṃ varmiṇa indra sākaṃ yavyāvatyām puruhūta śravasyā /
analyzed: triṃśat śatam varmiṇaḥ indra sākam yavyāvatyām puruhūta śravasyā

original: RV_6,027.06c vṛcīvantaḥ śarave patyamānāḥ pātrā bhindānā nyarthāny āyan //
analyzed: vṛcīvantaḥ śarave patyamānāḥ pātrā bhindānāḥ nyarthāni āyan

original: RV_6,027.07a yasya gāvāv aruṣā sūyavasyū antar ū ṣu carato rerihāṇā /
analyzed: yasya gāvau aruṣā sūyavasyū antar u su carataḥ rerihāṇā

original: RV_6,027.07c sa sṛñjayāya turvaśam parādād vṛcīvato daivavātāya śikṣan //
analyzed: sa sṛñjayāya turvaśam parādāt vṛcīvataḥ daivavātāya śikṣan

original: RV_6,027.08a dvayāṃ agne rathino viṃśatiṃ gā vadhūmato maghavā mahyaṃ samrāṭ /
analyzed: dvayām agne rathinaḥ viṃśatim gāḥ vadhūmataḥ maghavā mahyam samrāj

original: RV_6,027.08c abhyāvartī cāyamāno dadāti dūṇāśeyaṃ dakṣiṇā pārthavānām //
analyzed: abhyāvartī cāyamānaḥ dadāti dūṇāśeyam dakṣiṇā pārthavānām

original: RV_6,028.01a ā gāvo agmann uta bhadram akran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantv asme /
analyzed: ā gāvaḥ agman uta bhadram akran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantu asme

original: RV_6,028.01c prajāvatīḥ pururūpā iha syur indrāya pūrvīr uṣaso duhānāḥ //
analyzed: prajāvatīḥ puru rūpāḥ iha syuḥ indrāya pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ duhānāḥ

original: RV_6,028.02a indro yajvane pṛṇate ca śikṣaty uped dadāti na svam muṣāyati /
analyzed: indraḥ yajvane pṛṇate ca śikṣati upa id dadāti na svam muṣāyati

original: RV_6,028.02c bhūyo-bhūyo rayim id asya vardhayann abhinne khilye ni dadhāti devayum //
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas rayim id asya vardhayan abhinne khilye ni dadhāti devayum

original: RV_6,028.03a na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaro nāsām āmitro vyathir ā dadharṣati /
analyzed: na tāḥ naśanti na dabhāti taskaraḥ na āsām āmitraḥ vyathiḥ ā dadharṣati

original: RV_6,028.03c devāṃś ca yābhir yajate dadāti ca jyog it tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha //
analyzed: devān ca yābhiḥ yajate dadāti ca jyok id tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha

original: RV_6,028.04a na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo aśnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tā abhi /
analyzed: na tāḥ arvā reṇu kakāṭaḥ aśnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tāḥ abhi

original: RV_6,028.04c urugāyam abhayaṃ tasya tā anu gāvo martasya vi caranti yajvanaḥ //
analyzed: uru gāyam abhayam tasya tāḥ anu gāvaḥ martasya vi caranti yajvanaḥ

original: RV_6,028.05a gāvo bhago gāva indro me acchān gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ /
analyzed: gāvaḥ bhagaḥ gāvaḥ indraḥ me acchān gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ

original: RV_6,028.05c imā yā gāvaḥ sa janāsa indra icchāmīd dhṛdā manasā cid indram //
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ gāvaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ icchāmi id hṛdā manasā cit indram

original: RV_6,028.06a yūyaṃ gāvo medayathā kṛśaṃ cid aśrīraṃ cit kṛṇuthā supratīkam /
analyzed: yūyam gāvaḥ medayatha kṛśam cit aśrīram cit kṛṇutha su pratīkam

original: RV_6,028.06c bhadraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛṇutha bhadravāco bṛhad vo vaya ucyate sabhāsu //
analyzed: bhadram gṛham kṛṇutha bhadra vācaḥ bṛhat vaḥ vayaḥ ucyate sabhāsu

original: RV_6,028.07a prajāvatīḥ sūyavasaṃ riśantīḥ śuddhā apaḥ suprapāṇe pibantīḥ /
analyzed: prajāvatīḥ sūyavasam riśantīḥ śuddhāḥ apaḥ su prapāṇe pibantīḥ

original: RV_6,028.07c mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsaḥ pari vo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ //
analyzed: mā vaḥ stenaḥ īśata mā agha śaṃsaḥ pari vaḥ hetiḥ rudrasya vṛjyāḥ

original: RV_6,028.08a upedam upaparcanam āsu goṣūpa pṛcyatām /
analyzed: upa idam upaparcanam āsu goṣu upa pṛcyatām

original: RV_6,028.08c upa ṛṣabhasya retasy upendra tava vīrye //
analyzed: upa ṛṣabhasya retasi upa indra tava vīrye

original: RV_6,029.01a indraṃ vo naraḥ sakhyāya sepur maho yantaḥ sumataye cakānāḥ /
analyzed: indram vaḥ naraḥ sakhyāya sepuḥ mahaḥ yantaḥ sumataye cakānāḥ

original: RV_6,029.01c maho hi dātā vajrahasto asti mahām u raṇvam avase yajadhvam //
analyzed: mahaḥ hi dātā vajra hastaḥ asti mahām u raṇvam avase yajadhvam

original: RV_6,029.02a ā yasmin haste naryā mimikṣur ā rathe hiraṇyaye ratheṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: ā yasmin haste naryāḥ mimikṣuḥ ā rathe hiraṇyaye ratheṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_6,029.02c ā raśmayo gabhastyo sthūrayor ādhvann aśvāso vṛṣaṇo yujānāḥ //
analyzed: ā raśmayaḥ gabhastyoḥ sthūrayoḥ ādhvan aśvāsaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yujānāḥ

original: RV_6,029.03a śriye te pādā duva ā mimikṣur dhṛṣṇur vajrī śavasā dakṣiṇāvān /
analyzed: śriye te pādā duvaḥ ā mimikṣuḥ dhṛṣṇuḥ vajrī śavasā dakṣiṇāvān

original: RV_6,029.03c vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svar ṇa nṛtav iṣiro babhūtha //
analyzed: vasānaḥ atkam surabhim dṛśe kam svar na nṛto iṣiraḥ babhūtha

original: RV_6,029.04a sa soma āmiślatamaḥ suto bhūd yasmin paktiḥ pacyate santi dhānāḥ /
analyzed: sa somaḥ āmiślatamaḥ sutaḥ bhūt yasmin paktiḥ pacyate santi dhānāḥ

original: RV_6,029.04c indraṃ nara stuvanto brahmakārā ukthā śaṃsanto devavātatamāḥ //
analyzed: indram naraḥ stuvantaḥ brahma kārāḥ ukthā śaṃsantaḥ deva vātatamāḥ

original: RV_6,029.05a na te antaḥ śavaso dhāyy asya vi tu bābadhe rodasī mahitvā /
analyzed: na te antaḥ śavasaḥ dhāyi asya vi tu bābadhe rodasī mahitvā

original: RV_6,029.05c ā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujāno yūthevāpsu samījamāna ūtī //
analyzed: ā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ yūthā iva apsu samījamānaḥ ūtī

original: RV_6,029.06a eved indraḥ suhava ṛṣvo astūtī anūtī hiriśipraḥ satvā /
analyzed: eva id indraḥ su havaḥ ṛṣvaḥ astūtī anūtī hiri śipraḥ satvā

original: RV_6,029.06c evā hi jāto asamātyojāḥ purū ca vṛtrā hanati ni dasyūn //
analyzed: eva hi jātaḥ asamātyojāḥ purū ca vṛtrā hanati ni dasyūn

original: RV_6,030.01a bhūya id vāvṛdhe vīryāyaṃ eko ajuryo dayate vasūni /
analyzed: bhūyas id vāvṛdhe vīryāyam ekaḥ ajuryaḥ dayate vasūni

original: RV_6,030.01c pra ririce diva indraḥ pṛthivyā ardham id asya prati rodasī ubhe //
analyzed: pra ririce divaḥ indraḥ pṛthivyāḥ ardham id asya prati rodasī ubhe

original: RV_6,030.02a adhā manye bṛhad asuryam asya yāni dādhāra nakir ā mināti /
analyzed: adhā manye bṛhat asuryam asya yāni dādhāra nakir ā mināti

original: RV_6,030.02c dive-dive sūryo darśato bhūd vi sadmāny urviyā sukratur dhāt //
analyzed: dive dive sūryaḥ darśataḥ bhūt vi sadmāni urviyā su kratuḥ dhāt

original: RV_6,030.03a adyā cin nū cit tad apo nadīnāṃ yad ābhyo arado gātum indra /
analyzed: adyā cit nu cit tat apaḥ nadīnām yat ābhyaḥ aradaḥ gātum indra

original: RV_6,030.03c ni parvatā admasado na sedus tvayā dṛḷhāni sukrato rajāṃsi //
analyzed: ni parvatāḥ adma sadaḥ na seduḥ tvayā dṛḍhāni su krato rajāṃsi

original: RV_6,030.04a satyam it tan na tvāvāṃ anyo astīndra devo na martyo jyāyān /
analyzed: satyam id tat na tvāvām anyaḥ asti indra devaḥ na martyaḥ jyāyān

original: RV_6,030.04c ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇo 'vāsṛjo apo acchā samudram //
analyzed: ahan ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ vā asṛjaḥ apaḥ acchā samudram

original: RV_6,030.05a tvam apo vi duro viṣūcīr indra dṛḷham arujaḥ parvatasya /
analyzed: tvam apaḥ vi duraḥ viṣūcīḥ indra dṛḍham arujaḥ parvatasya

original: RV_6,030.05c rājābhavo jagataś carṣaṇīnāṃ sākaṃ sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsam //
analyzed: rājā abhavaḥ jagataḥ carṣaṇīnām sākam sūryam janayan dyām uṣāsam

original: RV_6,031.01a abhūr eko rayipate rayīṇām ā hastayor adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ /
analyzed: abhūḥ ekaḥ rayi pate rayīṇām ā hastayoḥ adhithāḥ indra kṛṣṭīḥ

original: RV_6,031.01c vi toke apsu tanaye ca sūre 'vocanta carṣaṇayo vivācaḥ //
analyzed: vi toke apsu tanaye ca sūre vocanta carṣaṇayaḥ vivācaḥ

original: RV_6,031.02a tvad bhiyendra pārthivāni viśvācyutā cic cyāvayante rajāṃsi /
analyzed: tvat bhiyā indra pārthivāni viśvā acyutā cit cyāvayante rajāṃsi

original: RV_6,031.02c dyāvākṣāmā parvatāso vanāni viśvaṃ dṛḷham bhayate ajmann ā te //
analyzed: dyāvākṣāmā parvatāsaḥ vanāni viśvam dṛḍham bhayate ajman ā te

original: RV_6,031.03a tvaṃ kutsenābhi śuṣṇam indrāśuṣaṃ yudhya kuyavaṃ gaviṣṭau /
analyzed: tvam kutsena abhi śuṣṇam indra aśuṣam yudhya kuyavam gaviṣṭau

original: RV_6,031.03c daśa prapitve adha sūryasya muṣāyaś cakram avive rapāṃsi //
analyzed: daśa prapitve adha sūryasya muṣāyaḥ cakram aviveḥ rapāṃsi

original: RV_6,031.04a tvaṃ śatāny ava śambarasya puro jaghanthāpratīni dasyoḥ /
analyzed: tvam śatāni ava śambarasya puraḥ jaghantha apratīni dasyoḥ

original: RV_6,031.04c aśikṣo yatra śacyā śacīvo divodāsāya sunvate sutakre bharadvājāya gṛṇate vasūni //
analyzed: aśikṣaḥ yatra śacyā śacīvas divodāsāya sunvate sutakre bharadvājāya gṛṇate vasūni

original: RV_6,031.05a sa satyasatvan mahate raṇāya ratham ā tiṣṭha tuvinṛmṇa bhīmam /
analyzed: sa satya satvan mahate raṇāya ratham ā tiṣṭha tuvi nṛmṇa bhīmam

original: RV_6,031.05c yāhi prapathinn avasopa madrik pra ca śruta śrāvaya carṣaṇibhyaḥ //
analyzed: yāhi prapathin avasā upa madrik pra ca śruta śrāvaya carṣaṇibhyaḥ

original: RV_6,032.01a apūrvyā purutamāny asmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya /
analyzed: apūrvyā purutamāni asmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya

original: RV_6,032.01c virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsy āsā sthavirāya takṣam //
analyzed: virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsi āsā sthavirāya takṣam

original: RV_6,032.02a sa mātarā sūryeṇā kavīnām avāsayad rujad adriṃ gṛṇānaḥ /
analyzed: sa mātarā sūryeṇa kavīnām avāsayat rujat adrim gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_6,032.02c svādhībhir ṛkvabhir vāvaśāna ud usriyāṇām asṛjan nidānam //
analyzed: su ādhībhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvaśānaḥ ud usriyāṇām asṛjat nidānam

original: RV_6,032.03a sa vahnibhir ṛkvabhir goṣu śaśvan mitajñubhiḥ purukṛtvā jigāya /
analyzed: sa vahnibhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ goṣu śaśvat mitajñubhiḥ purukṛtvā jigāya

original: RV_6,032.03c puraḥ purohā sakhibhiḥ sakhīyan dṛḷhā ruroja kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san //
analyzed: puraḥ purohā sakhibhiḥ sakhīyan dṛḷhā ruroja kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san

original: RV_6,032.04a sa nīvyābhir jaritāram acchā maho vājebhir mahadbhiś ca śuṣmaiḥ /
analyzed: sa nīvyābhiḥ jaritāram acchā mahaḥ vājebhiḥ mahadbhiḥ ca śuṣmaiḥ

original: RV_6,032.04c puruvīrābhir vṛṣabha kṣitīnām ā girvaṇaḥ suvitāya pra yāhi //
analyzed: puru vīrābhiḥ vṛṣabha kṣitīnām ā girvaṇaḥ suvitāya pra yāhi

original: RV_6,032.05a sa sargeṇa śavasā takto atyair apa indro dakṣiṇatas turāṣāṭ /
analyzed: sa sargeṇa śavasā taktaḥ atyaiḥ apa indraḥ dakṣiṇatas turāṣāh

original: RV_6,032.05c itthā sṛjānā anapāvṛd arthaṃ dive-dive viviṣur apramṛṣyam //
analyzed: itthā sṛjānāḥ anapāvṛt artham dive dive viviṣuḥ apramṛṣyam

original: RV_6,033.01a ya ojiṣṭha indra taṃ su no dā mado vṛṣan svabhiṣṭir dāsvān /
analyzed: yaḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ indra tam su naḥ dāḥ madaḥ vṛṣan su abhiṣṭiḥ dāsvān

original: RV_6,033.01c sauvaśvyaṃ yo vanavat svaśvo vṛtrā samatsu sāsahad amitrān //
analyzed: sauvaśvyam yaḥ vanavat su aśvaḥ vṛtrā samatsu sāsahat amitrān

original: RV_6,033.02a tvāṃ hīndrāvase vivāco havante carṣaṇayaḥ śūrasātau /
analyzed: tvām hi indra avase vivācaḥ havante carṣaṇayaḥ śūrasātau

original: RV_6,033.02c tvaṃ viprebhir vi paṇīṃr aśāyas tvota it sanitā vājam arvā //
analyzed: tvam viprebhiḥ vi paṇīn aśāyaḥ tvotaḥ id sanitā vājam arvā

original: RV_6,033.03a tvaṃ tāṃ indrobhayāṃ amitrān dāsā vṛtrāṇy āryā ca śūra /
analyzed: tvam tām indra ubhayān amitrān dāsā vṛtrāṇi āryā ca śūra

original: RV_6,033.03c vadhīr vaneva sudhitebhir atkair ā pṛtsu darṣi nṛṇāṃ nṛtama //
analyzed: vadhīḥ vanā iva sudhitebhiḥ atkaiḥ ā pṛtsu darṣi nṛṇām nṛtama

original: RV_6,033.04a sa tvaṃ na indrākavābhir ūtī sakhā viśvāyur avitā vṛdhe bhūḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra akavābhiḥ ūtī sakhā viśvāyuḥ avitā vṛdhe bhūḥ

original: RV_6,033.04c svarṣātā yad dhvayāmasi tvā yudhyanto nemadhitā pṛtsu śūra //
analyzed: svarṣātā yat hvayāmasi tvā yudhyantaḥ nemadhitā pṛtsu śūra

original: RV_6,033.05a nūnaṃ na indrāparāya ca syā bhavā mṛḷīka uta no abhiṣṭau /
analyzed: nūnam naḥ indra aparāya ca syāḥ bhava mṛḍīke uta naḥ abhiṣṭau

original: RV_6,033.05c itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śarman divi ṣyāma pārye goṣatamāḥ //
analyzed: itthā gṛṇantaḥ mahinasya śarman divi syāma pārye goṣatamāḥ

original: RV_6,034.01a saṃ ca tve jagmur gira indra pūrvīr vi ca tvad yanti vibhvo manīṣāḥ /
analyzed: sam ca tve jagmuḥ giraḥ indra pūrvīḥ vi ca tvat yanti vibhvaḥ manīṣāḥ

original: RV_6,034.01c purā nūnaṃ ca stutaya ṛṣīṇām paspṛdhra indre adhy ukthārkā //
analyzed: purā nūnam ca stutayaḥ ṛṣīṇām paspṛdhre indre adhi ukthā arkā

original: RV_6,034.02a puruhūto yaḥ purugūrta ṛbhvāṃ ekaḥ purupraśasto asti yajñaiḥ /
analyzed: puruhūtaḥ yaḥ puru gūrtaḥ ṛbhvān ekaḥ puru praśastaḥ asti yajñaiḥ

original: RV_6,034.02c ratho na mahe śavase yujāno 'smābhir indro anumādyo bhūt //
analyzed: rathaḥ na mahe śavase yujānaḥ smābhiḥ indraḥ anumādyaḥ bhūt

original: RV_6,034.03a na yaṃ hiṃsanti dhītayo na vāṇīr indraṃ nakṣantīd abhi vardhayantīḥ /
analyzed: na yam hiṃsanti dhītayaḥ na vāṇīḥ indram nakṣanti id abhi vardhayantīḥ

original: RV_6,034.03c yadi stotāraḥ śataṃ yat sahasraṃ gṛṇanti girvaṇasaṃ śaṃ tad asmai //
analyzed: yadi stotāraḥ śatam yat sahasram gṛṇanti girvaṇasam śam tat asmai

original: RV_6,034.04a asmā etad divy arceva māsā mimikṣa indre ny ayāmi somaḥ /
analyzed: asmai etat divi arcā iva māsā mimikṣe indre ni ayāmi somaḥ

original: RV_6,034.04c janaṃ na dhanvann abhi saṃ yad āpaḥ satrā vāvṛdhur havanāni yajñaiḥ //
analyzed: janam na dhanvan abhi sam yat āpaḥ satrā vāvṛdhuḥ havanāni yajñaiḥ

original: RV_6,034.05a asmā etan mahy āṅgūṣam asmā indrāya stotram matibhir avāci /
analyzed: asmai etat mahi āṅgūṣam asmai indrāya stotram matibhiḥ avāci

original: RV_6,034.05c asad yathā mahati vṛtratūrya indro viśvāyur avitā vṛdhaś ca //
analyzed: asat yathā mahati vṛtratūrye indraḥ viśvāyuḥ avitā vṛdhaḥ ca

original: RV_6,035.01a kadā bhuvan rathakṣayāṇi brahma kadā stotre sahasrapoṣyaṃ dāḥ /
analyzed: kadā bhuvan ratha kṣayāṇi brahma kadā stotre sahasra poṣyam dāḥ

original: RV_6,035.01c kadā stomaṃ vāsayo 'sya rāyā kadā dhiyaḥ karasi vājaratnāḥ //
analyzed: kadā stomam vāsayaḥ sya rāyā kadā dhiyaḥ karasi vāja ratnāḥ

original: RV_6,035.02a karhi svit tad indra yan nṛbhir nṝn vīrair vīrān nīḷayāse jayājīn /
analyzed: karhi svid tat indra yat nṛbhiḥ nṝn vīraiḥ vīrān nīḍayāse jaya ājīn

original: RV_6,035.02c tridhātu gā adhi jayāsi goṣv indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehy asme //
analyzed: tri dhātu gāḥ adhi jayāsi goṣu indra dyumnam svarvat dhehi asme

original: RV_6,035.03a karhi svit tad indra yaj jaritre viśvapsu brahma kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha /
analyzed: karhi svid tat indra yat jaritre viśvapsu brahma kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha

original: RV_6,035.03c kadā dhiyo na niyuto yuvāse kadā gomaghā havanāni gacchāḥ //
analyzed: kadā dhiyaḥ na niyutaḥ yuvāse kadā go maghā havanāni gacchāḥ

original: RV_6,035.04a sa gomaghā jaritre aśvaścandrā vājaśravaso adhi dhehi pṛkṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa go maghāḥ jaritre aśva ścandrāḥ vāja śravasaḥ adhi dhehi pṛkṣaḥ

original: RV_6,035.04c pīpihīṣaḥ sudughām indra dhenum bharadvājeṣu suruco rurucyāḥ //
analyzed: pīpihi iṣaḥ su dughām indra dhenum bharadvājeṣu su rucaḥ rurucyāḥ

original: RV_6,035.05a tam ā nūnaṃ vṛjanam anyathā cic chūro yac chakra vi duro gṛṇīṣe /
analyzed: tam ā nūnam vṛjanam anyathā cit śūraḥ yat śakra vi duraḥ gṛṇīṣe

original: RV_6,035.05c mā nir araṃ śukradughasya dhenor āṅgirasān brahmaṇā vipra jinva //
analyzed: mā niḥ aram śukra dughasya dhenoḥ āṅgirasān brahmaṇā vipra jinva

original: RV_6,036.01a satrā madāsas tava viśvajanyāḥ satrā rāyo 'dha ye pārthivāsaḥ /
analyzed: satrā madāsaḥ tava viśvajanyāḥ satrā rāyaḥ dha ye pārthivāsaḥ

original: RV_6,036.01c satrā vājānām abhavo vibhaktā yad deveṣu dhārayathā asuryam //
analyzed: satrā vājānām abhavaḥ vibhaktā yat deveṣu dhārayathāḥ asuryam

original: RV_6,036.02a anu pra yeje jana ojo asya satrā dadhire anu vīryāya /
analyzed: anu pra yeje janaḥ ojaḥ asya satrā dadhire anu vīryāya

original: RV_6,036.02c syūmagṛbhe dudhaye 'rvate ca kratuṃ vṛñjanty api vṛtrahatye //
analyzed: syūmagṛbhe dudhaye rvate ca kratum vṛñjanti api vṛtra hatye

original: RV_6,036.03a taṃ sadhrīcīr ūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścur indram /
analyzed: tam sadhrīcīḥ ūtayaḥ vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścuḥ indram

original: RV_6,036.03c samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ gira ā viśanti //
analyzed: samudram na sindhavaḥ uktha śuṣmāḥ uru vyacasam giraḥ ā viśanti

original: RV_6,036.04a sa rāyas khām upa sṛjā gṛṇānaḥ puruścandrasya tvam indra vasvaḥ /
analyzed: sa rāyaḥ khām upa sṛja gṛṇānaḥ puru ścandrasya tvam indra vasvaḥ

original: RV_6,036.04c patir babhūthāsamo janānām eko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā //
analyzed: patiḥ babhūtha asamaḥ janānām ekaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_6,036.05a sa tu śrudhi śrutyā yo duvoyur dyaur na bhūmābhi rāyo aryaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu śrudhi śrutyā yaḥ duvoyuḥ dyauḥ na bhūmā abhi rāyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_6,036.05c aso yathā naḥ śavasā cakāno yuge-yuge vayasā cekitānaḥ //
analyzed: asaḥ yathā naḥ śavasā cakānaḥ yuge yuge vayasā cekitānaḥ

original: RV_6,037.01a arvāg rathaṃ viśvavāraṃ ta ugrendra yuktāso harayo vahantu /
analyzed: arvāk ratham viśva vāram te ugra indra yuktāsaḥ harayaḥ vahantu

original: RV_6,037.01c kīriś cid dhi tvā havate svarvān ṛdhīmahi sadhamādas te adya //
analyzed: kīriḥ cit hi tvā havate svarvān ṛdhīmahi sadhamādaḥ te adya

original: RV_6,037.02a pro droṇe harayaḥ karmāgman punānāsa ṛjyanto abhūvan /
analyzed: pra u droṇe harayaḥ karma agman punānāsaḥ ṛjyantaḥ abhūvan

original: RV_6,037.02c indro no asya pūrvyaḥ papīyād dyukṣo madasya somyasya rājā //
analyzed: indraḥ naḥ asya pūrvyaḥ papīyāt dyukṣaḥ madasya somyasya rājā

original: RV_6,037.03a āsasrāṇāsaḥ śavasānam acchendraṃ sucakre rathyāso aśvāḥ /
analyzed: āsasrāṇāsaḥ śavasānam acchā indram su cakre rathyāsaḥ aśvāḥ

original: RV_6,037.03c abhi śrava ṛjyanto vaheyur nū cin nu vāyor amṛtaṃ vi dasyet //
analyzed: abhi śravaḥ ṛjyantaḥ vaheyuḥ nu cit nu vāyoḥ amṛtam vi dasyet

original: RV_6,037.04a variṣṭho asya dakṣiṇām iyartīndro maghonāṃ tuvikūrmitamaḥ /
analyzed: variṣṭhaḥ asya dakṣiṇām iyarti indraḥ maghonām tuvikūrmitamaḥ

original: RV_6,037.04c yayā vajrivaḥ pariyāsy aṃho maghā ca dhṛṣṇo dayase vi sūrīn //
analyzed: yayā vajrivas pariyāsi aṃhaḥ maghā ca dhṛṣṇo dayase vi sūrīn

original: RV_6,037.05a indro vājasya sthavirasya dātendro gīrbhir vardhatāṃ vṛddhamahāḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ vājasya sthavirasya dātā indraḥ gīrbhiḥ vardhatām vṛddha mahāḥ

original: RV_6,037.05c indro vṛtraṃ haniṣṭho astu satvā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtram haniṣṭhaḥ astu satvā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ

original: RV_6,038.01a apād ita ud u naś citratamo mahīm bharṣad dyumatīm indrahūtim /
analyzed: apāt itas ud u naḥ citratamaḥ mahīm bharṣat dyumatīm indra hūtim

original: RV_6,038.01c panyasīṃ dhītiṃ daivyasya yāmañ janasya rātiṃ vanate sudānuḥ //
analyzed: panyasīm dhītim daivyasya yāmam janasya rātim vanate sudānuḥ

original: RV_6,038.02a dūrāc cid ā vasato asya karṇā ghoṣād indrasya tanyati bruvāṇaḥ /
analyzed: dūrāt cit ā vasataḥ asya karṇā ghoṣāt indrasya tanyati bruvāṇaḥ

original: RV_6,038.02c eyam enaṃ devahūtir vavṛtyān madryag indram iyam ṛcyamānā //
analyzed: ā iyam enam deva hūtiḥ vavṛtyāt madryak indram iyam ṛcyamānā

original: RV_6,038.03a taṃ vo dhiyā paramayā purājām ajaram indram abhy anūṣy arkaiḥ /
analyzed: tam vaḥ dhiyā paramayā purājām ajaram indram abhī anūṣi arkaiḥ

original: RV_6,038.03c brahmā ca giro dadhire sam asmin mahāṃś ca stomo adhi vardhad indre //
analyzed: brahmā ca giraḥ dadhire sam asmin mahān ca stomaḥ adhi vardhat indre

original: RV_6,038.04a vardhād yaṃ yajña uta soma indraṃ vardhād brahma gira ukthā ca manma /
analyzed: vardhāt yam yajñaḥ uta somaḥ indram vardhāt brahma giraḥ ukthā ca manma

original: RV_6,038.04c vardhāhainam uṣaso yāmann aktor vardhān māsāḥ śarado dyāva indram //
analyzed: vardha aha enam uṣasaḥ yāman aktoḥ vardhān māsāḥ śaradaḥ dyāvaḥ indram

original: RV_6,038.05a evā jajñānaṃ sahase asāmi vāvṛdhānaṃ rādhase ca śrutāya /
analyzed: eva jajñānam sahase asāmi vāvṛdhānam rādhase ca śrutāya

original: RV_6,038.05c mahām ugram avase vipra nūnam ā vivāsema vṛtratūryeṣu //
analyzed: mahām ugram avase vipra nūnam ā vivāsema vṛtratūryeṣu

original: RV_6,039.01a mandrasya kaver divyasya vahner vipramanmano vacanasya madhvaḥ /
analyzed: mandrasya kaveḥ divyasya vahneḥ vipra manmanaḥ vacanasya madhvaḥ

original: RV_6,039.01c apā nas tasya sacanasya deveṣo yuvasva gṛṇate goagrāḥ //
analyzed: apāḥ naḥ tasya sacanasya deva iṣaḥ yuvasva gṛṇate go agrāḥ

original: RV_6,039.02a ayam uśānaḥ pary adrim usrā ṛtadhītibhir ṛtayug yujānaḥ /
analyzed: ayam uśānaḥ pari adrim usrāḥ ṛta dhītibhiḥ ṛta yuj yujānaḥ

original: RV_6,039.02c rujad arugṇaṃ vi valasya sānum paṇīṃr vacobhir abhi yodhad indraḥ //
analyzed: rujat a rugṇam vi valasya sānum paṇīn vacobhiḥ abhi yodhat indraḥ

original: RV_6,039.03a ayaṃ dyotayad adyuto vy aktūn doṣā vastoḥ śarada indur indra /
analyzed: ayam dyotayat adyutaḥ vi aktūn doṣā vastoḥ śaradaḥ induḥ indra

original: RV_6,039.03c imaṃ ketum adadhur nū cid ahnāṃ śucijanmana uṣasaś cakāra //
analyzed: imam ketum adadhuḥ nu cit ahnām śuci janmanaḥ uṣasaḥ cakāra

original: RV_6,039.04a ayaṃ rocayad aruco rucāno 'yaṃ vāsayad vy ṛtena pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: ayam rocayat arucaḥ rucānaḥ yam vāsayat vi ṛtena pūrvīḥ

original: RV_6,039.04c ayam īyata ṛtayugbhir aśvaiḥ svarvidā nābhinā carṣaṇiprāḥ //
analyzed: ayam īyate ṛta yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ svarvidā nābhinā carṣaṇi prāḥ

original: RV_6,039.05a nū gṛṇāno gṛṇate pratna rājann iṣaḥ pinva vasudeyāya pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: nu gṛṇānaḥ gṛṇate pratna rājan iṣaḥ pinva vasu deyāya pūrvīḥ

original: RV_6,039.05c apa oṣadhīr aviṣā vanāni gā arvato nṝn ṛcase rirīhi //
analyzed: apaḥ oṣadhīḥ aviṣāḥ vanāni gāḥ arvataḥ nṝn ṛcase rirīhi

original: RV_6,040.01a indra piba tubhyaṃ suto madāyāva sya harī vi mucā sakhāyā /
analyzed: indra piba tubhyam sutaḥ madāya ava sya harī vi muca sakhāyā

original: RV_6,040.01c uta pra gāya gaṇa ā niṣadyāthā yajñāya gṛṇate vayo dhāḥ //
analyzed: uta pra gāya gaṇe ā niṣadya athā yajñāya gṛṇate vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_6,040.02a asya piba yasya jajñāna indra madāya kratve apibo virapśin /
analyzed: asya piba yasya jajñānaḥ indra madāya kratve apibaḥ virapśin

original: RV_6,040.02c tam u te gāvo nara āpo adrir induṃ sam ahyan pītaye sam asmai //
analyzed: tam u te gāvaḥ naraḥ āpaḥ adriḥ indum sam ahyan pītaye sam asmai

original: RV_6,040.03a samiddhe agnau suta indra soma ā tvā vahantu harayo vahiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: samiddhe agnau sute indra some ā tvā vahantu harayaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_6,040.03c tvāyatā manasā johavīmīndrā yāhi suvitāya mahe naḥ //
analyzed: tvāyatā manasā johavīmi indra ā yāhi suvitāya mahe naḥ

original: RV_6,040.04a ā yāhi śaśvad uśatā yayāthendra mahā manasā somapeyam /
analyzed: ā yāhi śaśvat uśatā yayātha indra mahā manasā soma peyam

original: RV_6,040.04c upa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā no 'thā te yajñas tanve vayo dhāt //
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi śṛṇave imā naḥ thā te yajñaḥ tanve vayaḥ dhāt

original: RV_6,040.05a yad indra divi pārye yad ṛdhag yad vā sve sadane yatra vāsi /
analyzed: yat indra divi pārye yat ṛdhak yat vā sve sadane yatra vā asi

original: RV_6,040.05c ato no yajñam avase niyutvān sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ //
analyzed: atas naḥ yajñam avase niyutvān sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ

original: RV_6,041.01a aheḷamāna upa yāhi yajñaṃ tubhyam pavanta indavaḥ sutāsaḥ /
analyzed: a heḍamānaḥ upa yāhi yajñam tubhyam pavante indavaḥ sutāsaḥ

original: RV_6,041.01c gāvo na vajrin svam oko acchendrā gahi prathamo yajñiyānām //
analyzed: gāvaḥ na vajrin svam okaḥ acchā indra ā gahi prathamaḥ yajñiyānām

original: RV_6,041.02a yā te kākut sukṛtā yā variṣṭhā yayā śaśvat pibasi madhva ūrmim /
analyzed: yā te kākud su kṛtā yā variṣṭhā yayā śaśvat pibasi madhvaḥ ūrmim

original: RV_6,041.02c tayā pāhi pra te adhvaryur asthāt saṃ te vajro vartatām indra gavyuḥ //
analyzed: tayā pāhi pra te adhvaryuḥ asthāt sam te vajraḥ vartatām indra gavyuḥ

original: RV_6,041.03a eṣa drapso vṛṣabho viśvarūpa indrāya vṛṣṇe sam akāri somaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa drapsaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ viśva rūpaḥ indrāya vṛṣṇe sam akāri somaḥ

original: RV_6,041.03c etam piba hariva sthātar ugra yasyeśiṣe pradivi yas te annam //
analyzed: etam piba harivas sthātar ugra yasya īśiṣe pradivi yaḥ te annam

original: RV_6,041.04a sutaḥ somo asutād indra vasyān ayaṃ śreyāñ cikituṣe raṇāya /
analyzed: sutaḥ somaḥ a sutāt indra vasyān ayam śreyān cikituṣe raṇāya

original: RV_6,041.04c etaṃ titirva upa yāhi yajñaṃ tena viśvās taviṣīr ā pṛṇasva //
analyzed: etam titirvaḥ upa yāhi yajñam tena viśvāḥ taviṣīḥ ā pṛṇasva

original: RV_6,041.05a hvayāmasi tvendra yāhy arvāṅ araṃ te somas tanve bhavāti /
analyzed: hvayāmasi tvā indra yāhi arvāṅ aram te somaḥ tanve bhavāti

original: RV_6,041.05c śatakrato mādayasvā suteṣu prāsmāṃ ava pṛtanāsu pra vikṣu //
analyzed: śatakrato mādayasva suteṣu pra asmān ava pṛtanāsu pra vikṣu

original: RV_6,042.01a praty asmai pipīṣate viśvāni viduṣe bhara /
analyzed: prati asmai pipīṣate viśvāni viduṣe bhara

original: RV_6,042.01c araṅgamāya jagmaye 'paścāddaghvane nare //
analyzed: araṅgamāya jagmaye paścāddaghvane nare

original: RV_6,042.02a em enam pratyetana somebhiḥ somapātamam /
analyzed: ā īm enam pratyetana somebhiḥ soma pātamam

original: RV_6,042.02c amatrebhir ṛjīṣiṇam indraṃ sutebhir indubhiḥ //
analyzed: amatrebhiḥ ṛjīṣiṇam indram sutebhiḥ indubhiḥ

original: RV_6,042.03a yadī sutebhir indubhiḥ somebhiḥ pratibhūṣatha /
analyzed: yadī sutebhiḥ indubhiḥ somebhiḥ pratibhūṣatha

original: RV_6,042.03c vedā viśvasya medhiro dhṛṣat taṃ-tam id eṣate //
analyzed: veda viśvasya medhiraḥ dhṛṣat taṃtam id eṣate

original: RV_6,042.04a asmā-asmā id andhaso 'dhvaryo pra bharā sutam /
analyzed: asmai asmai id andhasaḥ dhvaryo pra bhara sutam

original: RV_6,042.04c kuvit samasya jenyasya śardhato 'bhiśaster avasparat //
analyzed: kuvid samasya jenyasya śardhataḥ bhiśasteḥ avasparat

original: RV_6,043.01a yasya tyac chambaram made divodāsāya randhayaḥ /
analyzed: yasya tyad śambaram made divodāsāya randhayaḥ

original: RV_6,043.01c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
analyzed: ayam sa somaḥ indra te sutaḥ piba

original: RV_6,043.02a yasya tīvrasutam madam madhyam antaṃ ca rakṣase /
analyzed: yasya tīvra sutam madam madhyam antam ca rakṣase

original: RV_6,043.02c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
analyzed: ayam sa somaḥ indra te sutaḥ piba

original: RV_6,043.03a yasya gā antar aśmano made dṛḷhā avāsṛjaḥ /
analyzed: yasya gāḥ antar aśmanaḥ made dṛḍhāḥ avāsṛjaḥ

original: RV_6,043.03c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
analyzed: ayam sa somaḥ indra te sutaḥ piba

original: RV_6,043.04a yasya mandāno andhaso māghonaṃ dadhiṣe śavaḥ /
analyzed: yasya mandānaḥ andhasaḥ māghonam dadhiṣe śavaḥ

original: RV_6,043.04c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
analyzed: ayam sa somaḥ indra te sutaḥ piba

original: RV_6,044.01a yo rayivo rayintamo yo dyumnair dyumnavattamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ rayivas rayintamaḥ yaḥ dyumnaiḥ dyumnavattamaḥ

original: RV_6,044.01c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ saḥ indra te sti svadhā pate madaḥ

original: RV_6,044.02a yaḥ śagmas tuviśagma te rāyo dāmā matīnām /
analyzed: yaḥ śagmaḥ tuvi śagma te rāyaḥ dāmā matīnām

original: RV_6,044.02c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ saḥ indra te sti svadhā pate madaḥ

original: RV_6,044.03a yena vṛddho na śavasā turo na svābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: yena vṛddhaḥ na śavasā turaḥ na svābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_6,044.03c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ saḥ indra te sti svadhā pate madaḥ

original: RV_6,044.04a tyam u vo aprahaṇaṃ gṛṇīṣe śavasas patim /
analyzed: tyam u vaḥ a prahaṇam gṛṇīṣe śavasaḥ patim

original: RV_6,044.04c indraṃ viśvāsāhaṃ naram maṃhiṣṭhaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim //
analyzed: indram viśvāsāham naram maṃhiṣṭham viśvacarṣaṇim

original: RV_6,044.05a yaṃ vardhayantīd giraḥ patiṃ turasya rādhasaḥ /
analyzed: yam vardhayanti id giraḥ patim turasya rādhasaḥ

original: RV_6,044.05c tam in nv asya rodasī devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ //
analyzed: tam id nu asya rodasī devī śuṣmam saparyataḥ

original: RV_6,044.06a tad va ukthasya barhaṇendrāyopastṛṇīṣaṇi /
analyzed: tat vaḥ ukthasya barhaṇā indrāya upastṛṇīṣaṇi

original: RV_6,044.06c vipo na yasyotayo vi yad rohanti sakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: vipaḥ na yasya ūtayaḥ vi yat rohanti sakṣitaḥ

original: RV_6,044.07a avidad dakṣam mitro navīyān papāno devebhyo vasyo acait /
analyzed: avidat dakṣam mitraḥ navīyān papānaḥ devebhyaḥ vasyaḥ acait

original: RV_6,044.07c sasavān staulābhir dhautarībhir uruṣyā pāyur abhavat sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: sasavān staulābhiḥ dhautarībhiḥ uruṣyā pāyuḥ abhavat sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_6,044.08a ṛtasya pathi vedhā apāyi śriye manāṃsi devāso akran /
analyzed: ṛtasya pathi vedhāḥ apāyi śriye manāṃsi devāsaḥ akran

original: RV_6,044.08c dadhāno nāma maho vacobhir vapur dṛśaye venyo vy āvaḥ //
analyzed: dadhānaḥ nāma mahaḥ vacobhiḥ vapuḥ dṛśaye venyaḥ vi āvaḥ

original: RV_6,044.09a dyumattamaṃ dakṣaṃ dhehy asme sedhā janānām pūrvīr arātīḥ /
analyzed: dyumattamam dakṣam dhehi asme sedha janānām pūrvīḥ arātīḥ

original: RV_6,044.09c varṣīyo vayaḥ kṛṇuhi śacībhir dhanasya sātāv asmāṃ aviḍḍhi //
analyzed: varṣīyaḥ vayaḥ kṛṇuhi śacībhiḥ dhanasya sātau asmān aviḍḍhi

original: RV_6,044.10a indra tubhyam in maghavann abhūma vayaṃ dātre harivo mā vi venaḥ /
analyzed: indra tubhyam id maghavan abhūma vayam dātre harivas mā vi venaḥ

original: RV_6,044.10c nakir āpir dadṛśe martyatrā kim aṅga radhracodanaṃ tvāhuḥ //
analyzed: nakir āpiḥ dadṛśe martyatrā kim aṅga radhra codanam tvā āhuḥ

original: RV_6,044.11a mā jasvane vṛṣabha no rarīthā mā te revataḥ sakhye riṣāma /
analyzed: mā jasvane vṛṣabha naḥ rarīthāḥ mā te revataḥ sakhye riṣāma

original: RV_6,044.11c pūrvīṣ ṭa indra niṣṣidho janeṣu jahy asuṣvīn pra vṛhāpṛṇataḥ //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ te indra niṣṣidhaḥ janeṣu jahi a suṣvīn pra vṛha apṛṇataḥ

original: RV_6,044.12a ud abhrāṇīva stanayann iyartīndro rādhāṃsy aśvyāni gavyā /
analyzed: ud abhrāṇi iva stanayan iyarti indraḥ rādhāṃsi aśvyāni gavyā

original: RV_6,044.12c tvam asi pradivaḥ kārudhāyā mā tvādāmāna ā dabhan maghonaḥ //
analyzed: tvam asi pradivaḥ kāru dhāyāḥ mā tvā adāmānaḥ ā dabhan maghonaḥ

original: RV_6,044.13a adhvaryo vīra pra mahe sutānām indrāya bhara sa hy asya rājā /
analyzed: adhvaryo vīra pra mahe sutānām indrāya bhara sa hi asya rājā

original: RV_6,044.13c yaḥ pūrvyābhir uta nūtanābhir gīrbhir vāvṛdhe gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām //
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvyābhiḥ uta nūtanābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ vāvṛdhe gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_6,044.14a asya made puru varpāṃsi vidvān indro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghāna /
analyzed: asya made puru varpāṃsi vidvān indraḥ vṛtrāṇi apratī jaghāna

original: RV_6,044.14c tam u pra hoṣi madhumantam asmai somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe pibadhyai //
analyzed: tam u pra hoṣi madhumantam asmai somam vīrāya śipriṇe pibadhyai

original: RV_6,044.15a pātā sutam indro astu somaṃ hantā vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ /
analyzed: pātā sutam indraḥ astu somam hantā vṛtram vajreṇa mandasānaḥ

original: RV_6,044.15c gantā yajñam parāvataś cid acchā vasur dhīnām avitā kārudhāyāḥ //
analyzed: gantā yajñam parāvataḥ cit acchā vasuḥ dhīnām avitā kāru dhāyāḥ

original: RV_6,044.16a idaṃ tyat pātram indrapānam indrasya priyam amṛtam apāyi /
analyzed: idam tyad pātram indra pānam indrasya priyam amṛtam apāyi

original: RV_6,044.16c matsad yathā saumanasāya devaṃ vy asmad dveṣo yuyavad vy aṃhaḥ //
analyzed: matsat yathā saumanasāya devam vi asmat dveṣaḥ yuyavat vi aṃhaḥ

original: RV_6,044.17a enā mandāno jahi śūra śatrūñ jāmim ajāmim maghavann amitrān /
analyzed: enā mandānaḥ jahi śūra śatrūm jāmim ajāmim maghavan amitrān

original: RV_6,044.17c abhiṣeṇāṃ abhy ādediśānān parāca indra pra mṛṇā jahī ca //
analyzed: abhiṣeṇām abhī ādediśānān parācaḥ indra pra mṛṇa jahi ca

original: RV_6,044.18a āsu ṣmā ṇo maghavann indra pṛtsv asmabhyam mahi varivaḥ sugaṃ kaḥ /
analyzed: āsu sma naḥ maghavan indra pṛtsu asmabhyam mahi varivaḥ su gam kaḥ

original: RV_6,044.18c apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣa indra sūrīn kṛṇuhi smā no ardham //
analyzed: apām tokasya tanayasya jeṣe indra sūrīn kṛṇuhi smā naḥ ardham

original: RV_6,044.19a ā tvā harayo vṛṣaṇo yujānā vṛṣarathāso vṛṣaraśmayo 'tyāḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā harayaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yujānāḥ vṛṣa rathāsaḥ vṛṣa raśmayaḥ tyāḥ

original: RV_6,044.19c asmatrāñco vṛṣaṇo vajravāho vṛṣṇe madāya suyujo vahantu //
analyzed: asmatrāñcaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vajra vāhaḥ vṛṣṇe madāya su yujaḥ vahantu

original: RV_6,044.20a ā te vṛṣan vṛṣaṇo droṇam asthur ghṛtapruṣo normayo madantaḥ /
analyzed: ā te vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ droṇam asthuḥ ghṛta pruṣaḥ na ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ

original: RV_6,044.20c indra pra tubhyaṃ vṛṣabhiḥ sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe bharanti vṛṣabhāya somam //
analyzed: indra pra tubhyam vṛṣabhiḥ sutānām vṛṣṇe bharanti vṛṣabhāya somam

original: RV_6,044.21a vṛṣāsi divo vṛṣabhaḥ pṛthivyā vṛṣā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabha stiyānām /
analyzed: vṛṣā asi divaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ vṛṣā sindhūnām vṛṣabhaḥ stiyānām

original: RV_6,044.21c vṛṣṇe ta indur vṛṣabha pīpāya svādū raso madhupeyo varāya //
analyzed: vṛṣṇe te induḥ vṛṣabha pīpāya svāduḥ rasaḥ madhu peyaḥ varāya

original: RV_6,044.22a ayaṃ devaḥ sahasā jāyamāna indreṇa yujā paṇim astabhāyat /
analyzed: ayam devaḥ sahasā jāyamānaḥ indreṇa yujā paṇim astabhāyat

original: RV_6,044.22c ayaṃ svasya pitur āyudhānīndur amuṣṇād aśivasya māyāḥ //
analyzed: ayam svasya pituḥ āyudhāni induḥ amuṣṇāt aśivasya māyāḥ

original: RV_6,044.23a ayam akṛṇod uṣasaḥ supatnīr ayaṃ sūrye adadhāj jyotir antaḥ /
analyzed: ayam akṛṇot uṣasaḥ su patnīḥ ayam sūrye adadhāt jyotiḥ antar

original: RV_6,044.23c ayaṃ tridhātu divi rocaneṣu triteṣu vindad amṛtaṃ nigūḷham //
analyzed: ayam tri dhātu divi rocaneṣu triteṣu vindat amṛtam nigūḍham

original: RV_6,044.24a ayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī vi ṣkabhāyad ayaṃ ratham ayunak saptaraśmim /
analyzed: ayam dyāvāpṛthivī vi skabhāyat ayam ratham ayunak sapta raśmim

original: RV_6,044.24c ayaṃ goṣu śacyā pakvam antaḥ somo dādhāra daśayantram utsam //
analyzed: ayam goṣu śacyā pakvam antar somaḥ dādhāra daśa yantram utsam

original: RV_6,045.01a ya ānayat parāvataḥ sunītī turvaśaṃ yadum /
analyzed: yaḥ ānayat parāvataḥ sunītī turvaśam yadum

original: RV_6,045.01c indraḥ sa no yuvā sakhā //
analyzed: indraḥ sa naḥ yuvā sakhā

original: RV_6,045.02a avipre cid vayo dadhad anāśunā cid arvatā /
analyzed: a vipre cit vayaḥ dadhat anāśunā cit arvatā

original: RV_6,045.02c indro jetā hitaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: indraḥ jetā hitam dhanam

original: RV_6,045.03a mahīr asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ /
analyzed: mahīḥ asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīḥ uta praśastayaḥ

original: RV_6,045.03c nāsya kṣīyanta ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: na asya kṣīyante ūtayaḥ

original: RV_6,045.04a sakhāyo brahmavāhase 'rcata pra ca gāyata /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ brahma vāhase rcata pra ca gāyata

original: RV_6,045.04c sa hi naḥ pramatir mahī //
analyzed: sa hi naḥ pramatiḥ mahī

original: RV_6,045.05a tvam ekasya vṛtrahann avitā dvayor asi /
analyzed: tvam ekasya vṛtrahan avitā dvayoḥ asi

original: RV_6,045.05c utedṛśe yathā vayam //
analyzed: uta īdṛśe yathā vayam

original: RV_6,045.06a nayasīd v ati dviṣaḥ kṛṇoṣy ukthaśaṃsinaḥ /
analyzed: nayasi id u ati dviṣaḥ kṛṇoṣi uktha śaṃsinaḥ

original: RV_6,045.06c nṛbhiḥ suvīra ucyase //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ su vīraḥ ucyase

original: RV_6,045.07a brahmāṇam brahmavāhasaṃ gīrbhiḥ sakhāyam ṛgmiyam /
analyzed: brahmāṇam brahma vāhasam gīrbhiḥ sakhāyam ṛgmiyam

original: RV_6,045.07c gāṃ na dohase huve //
analyzed: gām na dohase huve

original: RV_6,045.08a yasya viśvāni hastayor ūcur vasūni ni dvitā /
analyzed: yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ ūcuḥ vasūni ni dvitā

original: RV_6,045.08c vīrasya pṛtanāṣahaḥ //
analyzed: vīrasya pṛtanāṣahaḥ

original: RV_6,045.09a vi dṛḷhāni cid adrivo janānāṃ śacīpate /
analyzed: vi dṛḍhāni cit adrivas janānām śacīpate

original: RV_6,045.09c vṛha māyā anānata //
analyzed: vṛha māyāḥ an ānata

original: RV_6,045.10a tam u tvā satya somapā indra vājānām pate /
analyzed: tam u tvā satya soma pāḥ indra vājānām pate

original: RV_6,045.10c ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ //
analyzed: ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_6,045.11a tam u tvā yaḥ purāsitha yo vā nūnaṃ hite dhane /
analyzed: tam u tvā yaḥ purā āsitha yaḥ vā nūnam hite dhane

original: RV_6,045.11c havyaḥ sa śrudhī havam //
analyzed: havyaḥ sa śrudhi havam

original: RV_6,045.12a dhībhir arvadbhir arvato vājāṃ indra śravāyyān /
analyzed: dhībhiḥ arvadbhiḥ arvataḥ vājān indra śravāyyān

original: RV_6,045.12c tvayā jeṣma hitaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: tvayā jeṣma hitam dhanam

original: RV_6,045.13a abhūr u vīra girvaṇo mahāṃ indra dhane hite /
analyzed: abhūḥ u vīra girvaṇaḥ mahān indra dhane hite

original: RV_6,045.13c bhare vitantasāyyaḥ //
analyzed: bhare vitantasāyyaḥ

original: RV_6,045.14a yā ta ūtir amitrahan makṣūjavastamāsati /
analyzed: yā te ūtiḥ amitra han makṣūjavastamā asati

original: RV_6,045.14c tayā no hinuhī ratham //
analyzed: tayā naḥ hinuhi ratham

original: RV_6,045.15a sa rathena rathītamo 'smākenābhiyugvanā /
analyzed: sa rathena rathītamaḥ smākena abhiyugvanā

original: RV_6,045.15c jeṣi jiṣṇo hitaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: jeṣi jiṣṇo hitam dhanam

original: RV_6,045.16a ya eka it tam u ṣṭuhi kṛṣṭīnāṃ vicarṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id tam u stuhi kṛṣṭīnām vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_6,045.16c patir jajñe vṛṣakratuḥ //
analyzed: patiḥ jajñe vṛṣa kratuḥ

original: RV_6,045.17a yo gṛṇatām id āsithāpir ūtī śivaḥ sakhā /
analyzed: yaḥ gṛṇatām id āsitha āpiḥ ūtī śivaḥ sakhā

original: RV_6,045.17c sa tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra mṛḍaya

original: RV_6,045.18a dhiṣva vajraṃ gabhastyo rakṣohatyāya vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: dhiṣva vajram gabhastyoḥ rakṣaḥ hatyāya vajrivas

original: RV_6,045.18c sāsahīṣṭhā abhi spṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: sāsahīṣṭhāḥ abhi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_6,045.19a pratnaṃ rayīṇāṃ yujaṃ sakhāyaṃ kīricodanam /
analyzed: pratnam rayīṇām yujam sakhāyam kīri codanam

original: RV_6,045.19c brahmavāhastamaṃ huve //
analyzed: brahma vāhastamam huve

original: RV_6,045.20a sa hi viśvāni pārthivāṃ eko vasūni patyate /
analyzed: sa hi viśvāni pārthivān ekaḥ vasūni patyate

original: RV_6,045.20c girvaṇastamo adhriguḥ //
analyzed: girvaṇastamaḥ adhriguḥ

original: RV_6,045.21a sa no niyudbhir ā pṛṇa kāmaṃ vājebhir aśvibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ niyudbhiḥ ā pṛṇa kāmam vājebhiḥ aśvibhiḥ

original: RV_6,045.21c gomadbhir gopate dhṛṣat //
analyzed: gomadbhiḥ gopate dhṛṣat

original: RV_6,045.22a tad vo gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane /
analyzed: tat vaḥ gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane

original: RV_6,045.22c śaṃ yad gave na śākine //
analyzed: śam yat gave na śākine

original: RV_6,045.23a na ghā vasur ni yamate dānaṃ vājasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: na ghā vasuḥ ni yamate dānam vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_6,045.23c yat sīm upa śravad giraḥ //
analyzed: yat sīm upa śravat giraḥ

original: RV_6,045.24a kuvitsasya pra hi vrajaṃ gomantaṃ dasyuhā gamat /
analyzed: kuvitsasya pra hi vrajam gomantam dasyu hā gamat

original: RV_6,045.24c śacībhir apa no varat //
analyzed: śacībhiḥ apa naḥ varat

original: RV_6,045.25a imā u tvā śatakrato 'bhi pra ṇonuvur giraḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā śatakrato bhi pra nonuvuḥ giraḥ

original: RV_6,045.25c indra vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ //
analyzed: indra vatsam na mātaraḥ

original: RV_6,045.26a dūṇāśaṃ sakhyaṃ tava gaur asi vīra gavyate /
analyzed: dūṇāśam sakhyam tava gauḥ asi vīra gavyate

original: RV_6,045.26c aśvo aśvāyate bhava //
analyzed: aśvaḥ aśvāyate bhava

original: RV_6,045.27a sa mandasvā hy andhaso rādhase tanvā mahe /
analyzed: sa mandasva hi andhasaḥ rādhase tanvā mahe

original: RV_6,045.27c na stotāraṃ nide karaḥ //
analyzed: na stotāram nide karaḥ

original: RV_6,045.28a imā u tvā sute-sute nakṣante girvaṇo giraḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā sute sute nakṣante girvaṇaḥ giraḥ

original: RV_6,045.28c vatsaṃ gāvo na dhenavaḥ //
analyzed: vatsam gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_6,045.29a purūtamam purūṇāṃ stotṝṇāṃ vivāci /
analyzed: purūtamam purūṇām stotṝṇām vivāci

original: RV_6,045.29c vājebhir vājayatām //
analyzed: vājebhiḥ vājayatām

original: RV_6,045.30a asmākam indra bhūtu te stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam indra bhūtu te stomaḥ vāhiṣṭhaḥ antamaḥ

original: RV_6,045.30c asmān rāye mahe hinu //
analyzed: asmān rāye mahe hinu

original: RV_6,045.31a adhi bṛbuḥ paṇīnāṃ varṣiṣṭhe mūrdhann asthāt /
analyzed: adhi bṛbuḥ paṇīnām varṣiṣṭhe mūrdhan asthāt

original: RV_6,045.31c uruḥ kakṣo na gāṅgyaḥ //
analyzed: uruḥ kakṣaḥ na gāṅgyaḥ

original: RV_6,045.32a yasya vāyor iva dravad bhadrā rātiḥ sahasriṇī /
analyzed: yasya vāyoḥ iva dravat bhadrā rātiḥ sahasriṇī

original: RV_6,045.32c sadyo dānāya maṃhate //
analyzed: sadyas dānāya maṃhate

original: RV_6,045.33a tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ /
analyzed: tat su naḥ viśve aryaḥ ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_6,045.33c bṛbuṃ sahasradātamaṃ sūriṃ sahasrasātamam //
analyzed: bṛbum sahasra dātamam sūrim sahasra sātamam

original: RV_6,046.01a tvām id dhi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ /
analyzed: tvām id hi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ

original: RV_6,046.01c tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ naras tvāṃ kāṣṭhāsv arvataḥ //
analyzed: tvām vṛtreṣu indra satpatim naraḥ tvām kāṣṭhāsu arvataḥ

original: RV_6,046.02a sa tvaṃ naś citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā maha stavāno adrivaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ citra vajra hasta dhṛṣṇuyā mahaḥ stavānaḥ adrivas

original: RV_6,046.02c gām aśvaṃ rathyam indra saṃ kira satrā vājaṃ na jigyuṣe //
analyzed: gām aśvam rathyam indra sam kira satrā vājam na jigyuṣe

original: RV_6,046.03a yaḥ satrāhā vicarṣaṇir indraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam /
analyzed: yaḥ satrāhā vicarṣaṇiḥ indram tam hūmahe vayam

original: RV_6,046.03c sahasramuṣka tuvinṛmṇa satpate bhavā samatsu no vṛdhe //
analyzed: sahasra muṣka tuvi nṛmṇa satpate bhava samatsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_6,046.04a bādhase janān vṛṣabheva manyunā ghṛṣau mīḷha ṛcīṣama /
analyzed: bādhase janān vṛṣabhā iva manyunā ghṛṣau mīḍhe ṛcīṣama

original: RV_6,046.04c asmākam bodhy avitā mahādhane tanūṣv apsu sūrye //
analyzed: asmākam bodhi avitā mahādhane tanūṣu apsu sūrye

original: RV_6,046.05a indra jyeṣṭhaṃ na ā bharaṃ ojiṣṭham papuri śravaḥ /
analyzed: indra jyeṣṭham naḥ ā bhara ojiṣṭham papuri śravaḥ

original: RV_6,046.05c yeneme citra vajrahasta rodasī obhe suśipra prāḥ //
analyzed: yena ime citra vajrahasta rodasī ā ubhe su śipra prāḥ

original: RV_6,046.06a tvām ugram avase carṣaṇīsahaṃ rājan deveṣu hūmahe /
analyzed: tvām ugram avase carṣaṇī saham rājan deveṣu hūmahe

original: RV_6,046.06c viśvā su no vithurā pibdanā vaso 'mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi //
analyzed: viśvā su naḥ vithurā pibdanā vaso mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi

original: RV_6,046.07a yad indra nāhuṣīṣv āṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ ca kṛṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: yat indra nāhuṣīṣu ām ojaḥ nṛmṇam ca kṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_6,046.07c yad vā pañca kṣitīnāṃ dyumnam ā bhara satrā viśvāni pauṃsyā //
analyzed: yat vā pañca kṣitīnām dyumnam ā bhara satrā viśvāni pauṃsyā

original: RV_6,046.08a yad vā tṛkṣau maghavan druhyāv ā jane yat pūrau kac ca vṛṣṇyam /
analyzed: yat vā tṛkṣau maghavan druhyau ā jane yat pūrau kad ca vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_6,046.08c asmabhyaṃ tad rirīhi saṃ nṛṣāhye 'mitrān pṛtsu turvaṇe //
analyzed: asmabhyam tat rirīhi sam nṛṣāhye mitrān pṛtsu turvaṇe

original: RV_6,046.09a indra tridhātu śaraṇaṃ trivarūthaṃ svastimat /
analyzed: indra tri dhātu śaraṇam tri varūtham svastimat

original: RV_6,046.09c chardir yaccha maghavadbhyaś ca mahyaṃ ca yāvayā didyum ebhyaḥ //
analyzed: chardiḥ yaccha maghavadbhyaḥ ca mahyam ca yāvaya didyum ebhyaḥ

original: RV_6,046.10a ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhur abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā /
analyzed: ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhuḥ abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_6,046.10c adha smā no maghavann indra girvaṇas tanūpā antamo bhava //
analyzed: adha smā naḥ maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ tanū pāḥ antamaḥ bhava

original: RV_6,046.11a adha smā no vṛdhe bhavendra nāyam avā yudhi /
analyzed: adha smā naḥ vṛdhe bhava indra na ayam ava yudhi

original: RV_6,046.11c yad antarikṣe patayanti parṇino didyavas tigmamūrdhānaḥ //
analyzed: yat antarikṣe patayanti parṇinaḥ didyavaḥ tigma mūrdhānaḥ

original: RV_6,046.12a yatra śūrāsas tanvo vitanvate priyā śarma pitṝṇām /
analyzed: yatra śūrāsaḥ tanvaḥ vitanvate priyā śarma pitṝṇām

original: RV_6,046.12c adha smā yaccha tanve tane ca chardir acittaṃ yāvaya dveṣaḥ //
analyzed: adha smā yaccha tanve tane ca chardiḥ acittam yāvaya dveṣaḥ

original: RV_6,046.13a yad indra sarge arvataś codayāse mahādhane /
analyzed: yat indra sarge arvataḥ codayāse mahādhane

original: RV_6,046.13c asamane adhvani vṛjine pathi śyenāṃ iva śravasyataḥ //
analyzed: asamane adhvani vṛjine pathi śyenām iva śravasyataḥ

original: RV_6,046.14a sindhūṃr iva pravaṇa āśuyā yato yadi klośam anu ṣvaṇi /
analyzed: sindhūṃr iva pravaṇaḥ āśuyā yataḥ yadi klośam anu svani

original: RV_6,046.14c ā ye vayo na varvṛtaty āmiṣi gṛbhītā bāhvor gavi //
analyzed: ā ye vayaḥ na varvṛtati āmiṣi gṛbhītāḥ bāhvoḥ gavi

original: RV_6,047.01a svāduṣ kilāyam madhumāṃ utāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavāṃ utāyam /
analyzed: svāduḥ kila ayam madhumān uta ayam tīvraḥ kila ayam rasavān uta ayam

original: RV_6,047.01c uto nv asya papivāṃsam indraṃ na kaś cana sahata āhaveṣu //
analyzed: uta u nu asya papivāṃsam indram na kaḥ cana sahate āhaveṣu

original: RV_6,047.02a ayaṃ svādur iha madiṣṭha āsa yasyendro vṛtrahatye mamāda /
analyzed: ayam svāduḥ iha madiṣṭhaḥ āsa yasya indraḥ vṛtra hatye mamāda

original: RV_6,047.02c purūṇi yaś cyautnā śambarasya vi navatiṃ nava ca dehyo han //
analyzed: purūṇi yaḥ cyautnā śambarasya vi navatim nava ca dehyaḥ han

original: RV_6,047.03a ayam me pīta ud iyarti vācam ayam manīṣām uśatīm ajīgaḥ /
analyzed: ayam me pītaḥ ud iyarti vācam ayam manīṣām uśatīm ajīgaḥ

original: RV_6,047.03c ayaṃ ṣaḷ urvīr amimīta dhīro na yābhyo bhuvanaṃ kac canāre //
analyzed: ayam ṣaḍ urvīḥ amimīta dhīraḥ na yābhyaḥ bhuvanam kad cana āre

original: RV_6,047.04a ayaṃ sa yo varimāṇam pṛthivyā varṣmāṇaṃ divo akṛṇod ayaṃ saḥ /
analyzed: ayam sa yaḥ varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ varṣmāṇam divaḥ akṛṇot ayam saḥ

original: RV_6,047.04c ayam pīyūṣaṃ tisṛṣu pravatsu somo dādhārorv antarikṣam //
analyzed: ayam pīyūṣam tisṛṣu pravatsu somaḥ dādhāra uru antarikṣam

original: RV_6,047.05a ayaṃ vidac citradṛśīkam arṇaḥ śukrasadmanām uṣasām anīke /
analyzed: ayam vidat citra dṛśīkam arṇaḥ śukra sadmanām uṣasām anīke

original: RV_6,047.05c ayam mahān mahatā skambhanenod dyām astabhnād vṛṣabho marutvān //
analyzed: ayam mahān mahatā skambhanena ud dyām astabhnāt vṛṣabhaḥ marutvān

original: RV_6,047.06a dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām /
analyzed: dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtra hā śūra samare vasūnām

original: RV_6,047.06c mādhyandine savana ā vṛṣasva rayisthāno rayim asmāsu dhehi //
analyzed: mādhyandine savane ā vṛṣasva rayi sthānaḥ rayim asmāsu dhehi

original: RV_6,047.07a indra pra ṇaḥ puraeteva paśya pra no naya prataraṃ vasyo accha /
analyzed: indra pra naḥ puraetā iva paśya pra naḥ naya prataram vasyaḥ accha

original: RV_6,047.07c bhavā supāro atipārayo no bhavā sunītir uta vāmanītiḥ //
analyzed: bhava su pāraḥ atipārayaḥ naḥ bhava su nītiḥ uta vāma nītiḥ

original: RV_6,047.08a uruṃ no lokam anu neṣi vidvān svarvaj jyotir abhayaṃ svasti /
analyzed: urum naḥ lokam anu neṣi vidvān svarvat jyotiḥ abhayam svasti

original: RV_6,047.08c ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa stheyāma śaraṇā bṛhantā //
analyzed: ṛṣvā te indra sthavirasya bāhū upa stheyāma śaraṇā bṛhantā

original: RV_6,047.09a variṣṭhe na indra vandhure dhā vahiṣṭhayoḥ śatāvann aśvayor ā /
analyzed: variṣṭhe naḥ indra vandhure dhāḥ vahiṣṭhayoḥ śatāvan aśvayoḥ ā

original: RV_6,047.09c iṣam ā vakṣīṣāṃ varṣiṣṭhām mā nas tārīn maghavan rāyo aryaḥ //
analyzed: iṣam ā vakṣi iṣām varṣiṣṭhām mā naḥ tārīt maghavan rāyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_6,047.10a indra mṛḷa mahyaṃ jīvātum iccha codaya dhiyam ayaso na dhārām /
analyzed: indra mṛḍa mahyam jīvātum iccha codaya dhiyam ayasaḥ na dhārām

original: RV_6,047.10c yat kiṃ cāhaṃ tvāyur idaṃ vadāmi taj juṣasva kṛdhi mā devavantam //
analyzed: yat kim ca aham tvāyuḥ idam vadāmi tat juṣasva kṛdhi mā devavantam

original: RV_6,047.11a trātāram indram avitāram indraṃ have-have suhavaṃ śūram indram /
analyzed: trātāram indram avitāram indram havehave su havam śūram indram

original: RV_6,047.11c hvayāmi śakram puruhūtam indraṃ svasti no maghavā dhātv indraḥ //
analyzed: hvayāmi śakram puru hūtam indram svasti naḥ maghavā dhātu indraḥ

original: RV_6,047.12a indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ sutrāmā svavān avobhiḥ su mṛḷīkaḥ bhavatu viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_6,047.12c bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
analyzed: bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam kṛṇotu su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_6,047.13a tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma /
analyzed: tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: RV_6,047.13c sa sutrāmā svavāṃ indro asme ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu //
analyzed: sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asme ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu

original: RV_6,047.14a ava tve indra pravato normir giro brahmāṇi niyuto dhavante /
analyzed: ava tve indra pravataḥ nā ūrmiḥ giraḥ brahmāṇi niyutaḥ dhavante

original: RV_6,047.14c urū na rādhaḥ savanā purūṇy apo gā vajrin yuvase sam indūn //
analyzed: urū na rādhaḥ savanā purūṇi apaḥ gāḥ vajrin yuvase sam indūn

original: RV_6,047.15a ka īṃ stavat kaḥ pṛṇāt ko yajāte yad ugram in maghavā viśvahāvet /
analyzed: kaḥ īm stavat kaḥ pṛṇāt kaḥ yajāte yat ugram id maghavā viśvahā avet

original: RV_6,047.15c pādāv iva praharann anyam-anyaṃ kṛṇoti pūrvam aparaṃ śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: pādau iva praharan anyam anyam kṛṇoti pūrvam aparam śacībhiḥ

original: RV_6,047.16a śṛṇve vīra ugram-ugraṃ damāyann anyam-anyam atinenīyamānaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇve vīraḥ ugram ugram damāyan anyam anyam atinenīyamānaḥ

original: RV_6,047.16c edhamānadviḷ ubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśa indro manuṣyān //
analyzed: edhamāna dviṣ ubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśaḥ indraḥ manuṣyān

original: RV_6,047.17a parā pūrveṣāṃ sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇo aparebhir eti /
analyzed: parā pūrveṣām sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇaḥ aparebhiḥ eti

original: RV_6,047.17c anānubhūtīr avadhūnvānaḥ pūrvīr indraḥ śaradas tartarīti //
analyzed: anānubhūtīḥ avadhūnvānaḥ pūrvīḥ indraḥ śaradaḥ tartarīti

original: RV_6,047.18a rūpaṃ-rūpam pratirūpo babhūva tad asya rūpam praticakṣaṇāya /
analyzed: rūpam rūpam pratirūpaḥ babhūva tat asya rūpam praticakṣaṇāya

original: RV_6,047.18c indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate yuktā hy asya harayaḥ śatā daśa //
analyzed: indraḥ māyābhiḥ puru rūpaḥ īyate yuktāḥ hi asya harayaḥ śatāḥ daśa

original: RV_6,047.19a yujāno haritā rathe bhūri tvaṣṭeha rājati /
analyzed: yujānaḥ haritā rathe bhūri tvaṣṭā iha rājati

original: RV_6,047.19c ko viśvāhā dviṣataḥ pakṣa āsata utāsīneṣu sūriṣu //
analyzed: kaḥ viśvāhā dviṣataḥ pakṣe āsate uta āsīneṣu sūriṣu

original: RV_6,047.20a agavyūti kṣetram āganma devā urvī satī bhūmir aṃhūraṇābhūt /
analyzed: agavyūti kṣetram āganma devāḥ urvī satī bhūmiḥ aṃhūraṇā abhūt

original: RV_6,047.20c bṛhaspate pra cikitsā gaviṣṭāv itthā sate jaritra indra panthām //
analyzed: bṛhaspate pra cikitsa gaviṣṭau itthā sate jaritre indra panthām

original: RV_6,047.21a dive-dive sadṛśīr anyam ardhaṃ kṛṣṇā asedhad apa sadmano jāḥ /
analyzed: dive dive sadṛśīḥ anyam ardham kṛṣṇāḥ asedhat apa sadmanaḥ jāḥ

original: RV_6,047.21c ahan dāsā vṛṣabho vasnayantodavraje varcinaṃ śambaraṃ ca //
analyzed: ahan dāsā vṛṣabhaḥ vasnayantā udavraje varcinam śambaram ca

original: RV_6,047.22a prastoka in nu rādhasas ta indra daśa kośayīr daśa vājino 'dāt /
analyzed: prastokaḥ id nu rādhasaḥ te indra daśa kośayīḥ daśa vājinaḥ dāt

original: RV_6,047.22c divodāsād atithigvasya rādhaḥ śāmbaraṃ vasu praty agrabhīṣma //
analyzed: divodāsāt atithigvasya rādhaḥ śāmbaram vasu prati agrabhīṣma

original: RV_6,047.23a daśāśvān daśa kośān daśa vastrādhibhojanā /
analyzed: daśa aśvān daśa kośān daśa vastrā adhibhojanā

original: RV_6,047.23c daśo hiraṇyapiṇḍān divodāsād asāniṣam //
analyzed: daśa u hiraṇya piṇḍān divodāsāt asāniṣam

original: RV_6,047.24a daśa rathān praṣṭimataḥ śataṃ gā atharvabhyaḥ /
analyzed: daśa rathān praṣṭimataḥ śatam gāḥ atharvabhyaḥ

original: RV_6,047.24c aśvathaḥ pāyave 'dāt //
analyzed: aśvathaḥ pāyave dāt

original: RV_6,047.25a mahi rādho viśvajanyaṃ dadhānān bharadvājān sārñjayo abhy ayaṣṭa //
analyzed: mahi rādhaḥ viśvajanyam dadhānān bharadvājān sārñjayaḥ abhī ayaṣṭa

original: RV_6,047.26a vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ /
analyzed: vanaspate vīḍu aṅgaḥ hi bhūyāḥ asmad sakhā prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ

original: RV_6,047.26c gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḷayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni //
analyzed: gobhiḥ saṃnaddhaḥ asi vīḍayasva āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni

original: RV_6,047.27a divas pṛthivyāḥ pary oja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pary ābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari ojaḥ udbhṛtam vanaspatibhyaḥ pari ābhṛtam sahaḥ

original: RV_6,047.27c apām ojmānam pari gobhir āvṛtam indrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja //
analyzed: apām ojmānam pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam indrasya vajram haviṣā ratham yaja

original: RV_6,047.28a indrasya vajro marutām anīkam mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ marutām anīkam mitrasya garbhaḥ varuṇasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_6,047.28c semāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya //
analyzed: sa imām naḥ havya dātim juṣāṇaḥ deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya

original: RV_6,047.29a upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat /
analyzed: upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām purutrā te manutām viṣṭhitam jagat

original: RV_6,047.29c sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha śatrūn //
analyzed: sa dundubhe sajūs indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt davīyaḥ apa sedha śatrūn

original: RV_6,047.30a ā krandaya balam ojo na ā dhā ni ṣṭanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ /
analyzed: ā krandaya balam ojaḥ naḥ ā dhāḥ ni stanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ

original: RV_6,047.30c apa protha dundubhe ducchunā ita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḷayasva //
analyzed: apa protha dundubhe ducchunāḥ itas indrasya muṣṭiḥ asi vīḍayasva

original: RV_6,047.31a āmūr aja pratyāvartayemāḥ ketumad dundubhir vāvadīti /
analyzed: ā amūḥ aja pratyāvartaya imāḥ ketumat dundubhiḥ vāvadīti

original: RV_6,047.31c sam aśvaparṇāś caranti no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu //
analyzed: sam aśva parṇāḥ caranti naḥ naraḥ smākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu

original: RV_6,048.01a yajñā-yajñā vo agnaye girā-girā ca dakṣase /
analyzed: yajñāyajñāḥ vaḥ agnaye girā girā ca dakṣase

original: RV_6,048.01c pra-pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam priyam mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam //
analyzed: pra pra vayam amṛtam jātavedasam priyam mitram na śaṃsiṣam

original: RV_6,048.02a ūrjo napātaṃ sa hināyam asmayur dāśema havyadātaye /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam sa hina ayam asmayuḥ dāśema havya dātaye

original: RV_6,048.02c bhuvad vājeṣv avitā bhuvad vṛdha uta trātā tanūnām //
analyzed: bhuvat vājeṣu avitā bhuvat vṛdhaḥ uta trātā tanūnām

original: RV_6,048.03a vṛṣā hy agne ajaro mahān vibhāsy arciṣā /
analyzed: vṛṣā hi agne ajaraḥ mahān vibhāsi arciṣā

original: RV_6,048.03c ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucac chuce sudītibhiḥ su dīdihi //
analyzed: ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucat śuce su dītibhiḥ su dīdihi

original: RV_6,048.04a maho devān yajasi yakṣy ānuṣak tava kratvota daṃsanā /
analyzed: mahaḥ devān yajasi yakṣi ānuṣak tava kratvā uta daṃsanā

original: RV_6,048.04c arvācaḥ sīṃ kṛṇuhy agne 'vase rāsva vājota vaṃsva //
analyzed: arvācaḥ sīm kṛṇuhi agne vase rāsva vājā uta vaṃsva

original: RV_6,048.05a yam āpo adrayo vanā garbham ṛtasya piprati /
analyzed: yam āpaḥ adrayaḥ vanā garbham ṛtasya piprati

original: RV_6,048.05c sahasā yo mathito jāyate nṛbhiḥ pṛthivyā adhi sānavi //
analyzed: sahasā yaḥ mathitaḥ jāyate nṛbhiḥ pṛthivyāḥ adhi sānavi

original: RV_6,048.06a ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā rodasī ubhe dhūmena dhāvate divi /
analyzed: ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā rodasī ubhe dhūmena dhāvate divi

original: RV_6,048.06c tiras tamo dadṛśa ūrmyāsv ā śyāvāsv aruṣo vṛṣā śyāvā aruṣo vṛṣā //
analyzed: tiras tamaḥ dadṛśe ūrmyāsu ā śyāvāsu aruṣaḥ vṛṣā śyāvāḥ aruṣaḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_6,048.07a bṛhadbhir agne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā /
analyzed: bṛhadbhiḥ agne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā

original: RV_6,048.07c bharadvāje samidhāno yaviṣṭhya revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi //
analyzed: bharadvāje samidhānaḥ yaviṣṭhya revat naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi

original: RV_6,048.08a viśvāsāṃ gṛhapatir viśām asi tvam agne mānuṣīṇām /
analyzed: viśvāsām gṛhapatiḥ viśām asi tvam agne mānuṣīṇām

original: RV_6,048.08c śatam pūrbhir yaviṣṭha pāhy aṃhasaḥ sameddhāraṃ śataṃ himā stotṛbhyo ye ca dadati //
analyzed: śatam pūrbhiḥ yaviṣṭha pāhi aṃhasaḥ sameddhāram śatam himā stotṛbhyaḥ ye ca dadati

original: RV_6,048.09a tvaṃ naś citra ūtyā vaso rādhāṃsi codaya /
analyzed: tvam naḥ citraḥ ūtyā vaso rādhāṃsi codaya

original: RV_6,048.09c asya rāyas tvam agne rathīr asi vidā gādhaṃ tuce tu naḥ //
analyzed: asya rāyaḥ tvam agne rathīḥ asi vida gādham tuce tu naḥ

original: RV_6,048.10a parṣi tokaṃ tanayam partṛbhiṣ ṭvam adabdhair aprayutvabhiḥ /
analyzed: parṣi tokam tanayam partṛbhiḥ tvam adabdhaiḥ aprayutvabhiḥ

original: RV_6,048.10c agne heḷāṃsi daivyā yuyodhi no 'devāni hvarāṃsi ca //
analyzed: agne heḍāṃsi daivyā yuyodhi naḥ devāni hvarāṃsi ca

original: RV_6,048.11a ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughāṃ dhenum ajadhvam upa navyasā vacaḥ /
analyzed: ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughām dhenum ajadhvam upa navyasā vacaḥ

original: RV_6,048.11c sṛjadhvam anapasphurām //
analyzed: sṛjadhvam an apasphurām

original: RV_6,048.12a yā śardhāya mārutāya svabhānave śravo 'mṛtyu dhukṣata /
analyzed: yā śardhāya mārutāya sva bhānave śravaḥ mṛtyu dhukṣata

original: RV_6,048.12c yā mṛḷīke marutāṃ turāṇāṃ yā sumnair evayāvarī //
analyzed: yā mṛḍīke marutām turāṇām yā sumnaiḥ eva yāvarī

original: RV_6,048.13a bharadvājāyāva dhukṣata dvitā /
analyzed: bharadvājāya ava dhukṣata dvitā

original: RV_6,048.13b dhenuṃ ca viśvadohasam iṣaṃ ca viśvabhojasam //
analyzed: dhenum ca viśva dohasam iṣam ca viśva bhojasam

original: RV_6,048.14a taṃ va indraṃ na sukratuṃ varuṇam iva māyinam /
analyzed: tam vaḥ indram na su kratum varuṇam iva māyinam

original: RV_6,048.14c aryamaṇaṃ na mandraṃ sṛprabhojasaṃ viṣṇuṃ na stuṣa ādiśe //
analyzed: aryamaṇam na mandram sṛpra bhojasam viṣṇum na stuṣe ādiśe

original: RV_6,048.15a tveṣaṃ śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇy anarvāṇam pūṣaṇaṃ saṃ yathā śatā /
analyzed: tveṣam śardhaḥ na mārutam tuviṣvaṇi anarvāṇam pūṣaṇam sam yathā śatā

original: RV_6,048.15c saṃ sahasrā kāriṣac carṣaṇibhya āṃ āvir gūḷhā vasū karat suvedā no vasū karat //
analyzed: sam sahasrā kāriṣat carṣaṇibhyaḥ ām āvis gūḍhā vasū karat su vedā naḥ vasū karat

original: RV_6,048.16a ā mā pūṣann upa drava śaṃsiṣaṃ nu te apikarṇa āghṛṇe /
analyzed: ā mā pūṣan upa drava śaṃsiṣam nu te apikarṇe āghṛṇe

original: RV_6,048.16c aghā aryo arātayaḥ //
analyzed: aghāḥ aryaḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_6,048.17a mā kākambīram ud vṛho vanaspatim aśastīr vi hi nīnaśaḥ /
analyzed: mā kākambīram ud vṛhaḥ vanaspatim aśastīḥ vi hi nīnaśaḥ

original: RV_6,048.17c mota sūro aha evā cana grīvā ādadhate veḥ //
analyzed: mā uta sūraḥ aha evā cana grīvāḥ ādadhate veḥ

original: RV_6,048.18a dṛter iva te 'vṛkam astu sakhyam /
analyzed: dṛteḥ iva te vṛkam astu sakhyam

original: RV_6,048.18b acchidrasya dadhanvataḥ supūrṇasya dadhanvataḥ //
analyzed: acchidrasya dadhanvataḥ su pūrṇasya dadhanvataḥ

original: RV_6,048.19a paro hi martyair asi samo devair uta śriyā /
analyzed: paraḥ hi martyaiḥ asi samaḥ devaiḥ uta śriyā

original: RV_6,048.19c abhi khyaḥ pūṣan pṛtanāsu nas tvam avā nūnaṃ yathā purā //
analyzed: abhi khyaḥ pūṣan pṛtanāsu naḥ tvam avāḥ nūnam yathā purā

original: RV_6,048.20a vāmī vāmasya dhūtayaḥ praṇītir astu sūnṛtā /
analyzed: vāmī vāmasya dhūtayaḥ praṇītiḥ astu sūnṛtā

original: RV_6,048.20c devasya vā maruto martyasya vejānasya prayajyavaḥ //
analyzed: devasya vā marutaḥ martyasya vejānasya prayajyavaḥ

original: RV_6,048.21a sadyaś cid yasya carkṛtiḥ pari dyāṃ devo naiti sūryaḥ /
analyzed: sadyas cit yasya carkṛtiḥ pari dyām devaḥ nā eti sūryaḥ

original: RV_6,048.21c tveṣaṃ śavo dadhire nāma yajñiyam maruto vṛtrahaṃ śavo jyeṣṭhaṃ vṛtrahaṃ śavaḥ //
analyzed: tveṣam śavaḥ dadhire nāma yajñiyam marutaḥ vṛtraham śavaḥ jyeṣṭham vṛtraham śavaḥ

original: RV_6,048.22a sakṛd dha dyaur ajāyata sakṛd bhūmir ajāyata /
analyzed: sakṛt ha dyauḥ ajāyata sakṛt bhūmiḥ ajāyata

original: RV_6,048.22c pṛśnyā dugdhaṃ sakṛt payas tad anyo nānu jāyate //
analyzed: pṛśnyāḥ dugdham sakṛt payaḥ tat anyaḥ na anu jāyate

original: RV_6,049.01a stuṣe janaṃ suvrataṃ navyasībhir gīrbhir mitrāvaruṇā sumnayantā /
analyzed: stuṣe janam suvratam navyasībhiḥ gīrbhiḥ mitrāvaruṇā sumnayantā

original: RV_6,049.01c ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantu sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agniḥ //
analyzed: te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu su kṣatrāsaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_6,049.02a viśo-viśa īḍyam adhvareṣv adṛptakratum aratiṃ yuvatyoḥ /
analyzed: viśoviśaḥ īḍyam adhvareṣu adṛpta kratum aratim yuvatyoḥ

original: RV_6,049.02c divaḥ śiśuṃ sahasaḥ sūnum agniṃ yajñasya ketum aruṣaṃ yajadhyai //
analyzed: divaḥ śiśum sahasaḥ sūnum agnim yajñasya ketum aruṣam yajadhyai

original: RV_6,049.03a aruṣasya duhitarā virūpe stṛbhir anyā pipiśe sūro anyā /
analyzed: aruṣasya duhitarā virūpe stṛbhiḥ anyā pipiśe sūraḥ anyā

original: RV_6,049.03c mithasturā vicarantī pāvake manma śrutaṃ nakṣata ṛcyamāne //
analyzed: mithasturā vicarantī pāvake manma śrutam nakṣataḥ ṛcyamāne

original: RV_6,049.04a pra vāyum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhadrayiṃ viśvavāraṃ rathaprām /
analyzed: pra vāyum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhat rayim viśva vāram ratha prām

original: RV_6,049.04c dyutadyāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo //
analyzed: dyutat yāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo

original: RV_6,049.05a sa me vapuś chadayad aśvinor yo ratho virukmān manasā yujānaḥ /
analyzed: sa me vapuḥ chadayat aśvinoḥ yaḥ rathaḥ virukmān manasā yujānaḥ

original: RV_6,049.05c yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartir yāthas tanayāya tmane ca //
analyzed: yena narā nāsatyā iṣayadhyai vartiḥ yāthaḥ tanayāya tmane ca

original: RV_6,049.06a parjanyavātā vṛṣabhā pṛthivyāḥ purīṣāṇi jinvatam apyāni /
analyzed: parjanya vātā vṛṣabhā pṛthivyāḥ purīṣāṇi jinvatam apyāni

original: RV_6,049.06c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yasya gīrbhir jagata sthātar jagad ā kṛṇudhvam //
analyzed: satya śrutaḥ kavayaḥ yasya gīrbhiḥ jagataḥ sthātar jagat ā kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_6,049.07a pāvīravī kanyā citrāyuḥ sarasvatī vīrapatnī dhiyaṃ dhāt /
analyzed: pāvīravī kanyā citra āyuḥ sarasvatī vīra patnī dhiyam dhāt

original: RV_6,049.07c gnābhir acchidraṃ śaraṇaṃ sajoṣā durādharṣaṃ gṛṇate śarma yaṃsat //
analyzed: gnābhiḥ acchidram śaraṇam sajoṣāḥ durādharṣam gṛṇate śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_6,049.08a pathas-pathaḥ paripatiṃ vacasyā kāmena kṛto abhy ānaḷ arkam /
analyzed: pathaspathaḥ paripatim vacasyā kāmena kṛtaḥ abhī ānaṭ arkam

original: RV_6,049.08c sa no rāsac churudhaś candrāgrā dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā //
analyzed: sa naḥ rāsat śurudhaḥ candra agrāḥ dhiyam dhiyam sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā

original: RV_6,049.09a prathamabhājaṃ yaśasaṃ vayodhāṃ supāṇiṃ devaṃ sugabhastim ṛbhvam /
analyzed: prathama bhājam yaśasam vayaḥ dhām su pāṇim devam su gabhastim ṛbhvam

original: RV_6,049.09c hotā yakṣad yajatam pastyānām agnis tvaṣṭāraṃ suhavaṃ vibhāvā //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat yajatam pastyānām agniḥ tvaṣṭāram su havam vibhāvā

original: RV_6,049.10a bhuvanasya pitaraṃ gīrbhir ābhī rudraṃ divā vardhayā rudram aktau /
analyzed: bhuvanasya pitaram gīrbhiḥ ābhiḥ rudram divā vardhaya rudram aktau

original: RV_6,049.10c bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ suṣumnam ṛdhag ghuvema kavineṣitāsaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaram suṣumnam ṛdhak ghuvema kavinā iṣitāsaḥ

original: RV_6,049.11a ā yuvānaḥ kavayo yajñiyāso maruto ganta gṛṇato varasyām /
analyzed: ā yuvānaḥ kavayaḥ yajñiyāsaḥ marutaḥ ganta gṛṇataḥ varasyām

original: RV_6,049.11c acitraṃ cid dhi jinvathā vṛdhanta itthā nakṣanto naro aṅgirasvat //
analyzed: acitram cit hi jinvatha vṛdhantaḥ itthā nakṣantaḥ naraḥ aṅgirasvat

original: RV_6,049.12a pra vīrāya pra tavase turāyājā yūtheva paśurakṣir astam /
analyzed: pra vīrāya pra tavase turāya ajā yūthā iva paśurakṣiḥ astam

original: RV_6,049.12c sa pispṛśati tanvi śrutasya stṛbhir na nākaṃ vacanasya vipaḥ //
analyzed: sa pispṛśati tanvi śrutasya stṛbhiḥ na nākam vacanasya vipaḥ

original: RV_6,049.13a yo rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni triś cid viṣṇur manave bādhitāya /
analyzed: yaḥ rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni tris cit viṣṇuḥ manave bādhitāya

original: RV_6,049.13c tasya te śarmann upadadyamāne rāyā madema tanvā tanā ca //
analyzed: tasya te śarman upadadyamāne rāyā madema tanvā tanā ca

original: RV_6,049.14a tan no 'hir budhnyo adbhir arkais tat parvatas tat savitā cano dhāt /
analyzed: tat naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ adbhiḥ arkaiḥ tat parvataḥ tat savitā canaḥ dhāt

original: RV_6,049.14c tad oṣadhībhir abhi rātiṣāco bhagaḥ purandhir jinvatu pra rāye //
analyzed: tat oṣadhībhiḥ abhi rātiṣācaḥ bhagaḥ purandhiḥ jinvatu pra rāye

original: RV_6,049.15a nu no rayiṃ rathyaṃ carṣaṇiprām puruvīram maha ṛtasya gopām /
analyzed: nu naḥ rayim rathyam carṣaṇi prām puru vīram mahaḥ ṛtasya gopām

original: RV_6,049.15c kṣayaṃ dātājaraṃ yena janān spṛdho adevīr abhi ca kramāma viśa ādevīr abhy aśnavāma //
analyzed: kṣayam dāta ajaram yena janān spṛdhaḥ adevīḥ abhi ca kramāma viśaḥ ādevīḥ abhī aśnavāma

original: RV_6,050.01a huve vo devīm aditiṃ namobhir mṛḷīkāya varuṇam mitram agnim /
analyzed: huve vaḥ devīm aditim namobhiḥ mṛḷīkāya varuṇam mitram agnim

original: RV_6,050.01c abhikṣadām aryamaṇaṃ suśevaṃ trātṝn devān savitāram bhagaṃ ca //
analyzed: abhikṣa dām aryamaṇam su śevam trātṝn devān savitāram bhagam ca

original: RV_6,050.02a sujyotiṣaḥ sūrya dakṣapitṝn anāgāstve sumaho vīhi devān /
analyzed: su jyotiṣaḥ sūrya dakṣa pitṝn anāgāstve su mahaḥ vīhi devān

original: RV_6,050.02c dvijanmāno ya ṛtasāpaḥ satyāḥ svarvanto yajatā agnijihvāḥ //
analyzed: dvi janmānaḥ ye ṛtasāpaḥ satyāḥ svarvantaḥ yajatāḥ agni jihvāḥ

original: RV_6,050.03a uta dyāvāpṛthivī kṣatram uru bṛhad rodasī śaraṇaṃ suṣumne /
analyzed: uta dyāvāpṛthivī kṣatram uru bṛhat rodasī śaraṇam suṣumne

original: RV_6,050.03c mahas karatho varivo yathā no 'sme kṣayāya dhiṣaṇe anehaḥ //
analyzed: mahaḥ karathaḥ varivaḥ yathā naḥ sme kṣayāya dhiṣaṇe anehaḥ

original: RV_6,050.04a ā no rudrasya sūnavo namantām adyā hūtāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ rudrasya sūnavaḥ namantām adyā hūtāsaḥ vasavaḥ dhṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_6,050.04c yad īm arbhe mahati vā hitāso bādhe maruto ahvāma devān //
analyzed: yat īm arbhe mahati vā hitāsaḥ bādhe marutaḥ ahvāma devān

original: RV_6,050.05a mimyakṣa yeṣu rodasī nu devī siṣakti pūṣā abhyardhayajvā /
analyzed: mimyakṣa yeṣu rodasī nu devī siṣakti pūṣā abhyardha yajvā

original: RV_6,050.05c śrutvā havam maruto yad dha yātha bhūmā rejante adhvani pravikte //
analyzed: śrutvā havam marutaḥ yat ha yātha bhūmāḥ rejante adhvani pravikte

original: RV_6,050.06a abhi tyaṃ vīraṃ girvaṇasam arcendram brahmaṇā jaritar navena /
analyzed: abhi tyam vīram girvaṇasam arca indram brahmaṇā jaritar navena

original: RV_6,050.06c śravad id dhavam upa ca stavāno rāsad vājāṃ upa maho gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: śravat id havam upa ca stavānaḥ rāsat vājān upa mahaḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_6,050.07a omānam āpo mānuṣīr amṛktaṃ dhāta tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ /
analyzed: omānam āpaḥ mānuṣīḥ amṛktam dhāta tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_6,050.07c yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā bhiṣajo mātṛtamā viśvasya sthātur jagato janitrīḥ //
analyzed: yūyam hi stha bhiṣajaḥ mātṛtamāḥ viśvasya sthātuḥ jagataḥ janitrīḥ

original: RV_6,050.08a ā no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇo hiraṇyapāṇir yajato jagamyāt /
analyzed: ā naḥ devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ hiraṇya pāṇiḥ yajataḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_6,050.08c yo datravāṃ uṣaso na pratīkaṃ vyūrṇute dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
analyzed: yaḥ datravān uṣasaḥ na pratīkam vyūrṇute dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: RV_6,050.09a uta tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adyā devāṃ asminn adhvare vavṛtyāḥ /
analyzed: uta tvam sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adyā devān asmin adhvare vavṛtyāḥ

original: RV_6,050.09c syām ahaṃ te sadam id rātau tava syām agne 'vasā suvīraḥ //
analyzed: syām aham te sadam id rātau tava syām agne vasā su vīraḥ

original: RV_6,050.10a uta tyā me havam ā jagmyātaṃ nāsatyā dhībhir yuvam aṅga viprā /
analyzed: uta tyā me havam ā jagmyātam nāsatyā dhībhiḥ yuvam aṅga viprā

original: RV_6,050.10c atriṃ na mahas tamaso 'mumuktaṃ tūrvataṃ narā duritād abhīke //
analyzed: atrim na mahaḥ tamasaḥ mumuktam tūrvatam narā duritāt abhīke

original: RV_6,050.11a te no rāyo dyumato vājavato dātāro bhūta nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ /
analyzed: te naḥ rāyaḥ dyumataḥ vājavataḥ dātāraḥ bhūta nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ

original: RV_6,050.11c daśasyanto divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā apyā mṛḷatā ca devāḥ //
analyzed: daśasyantaḥ divyāḥ pārthivāsaḥ go jātāḥ apyāḥ mṛḍatā ca devāḥ

original: RV_6,050.12a te no rudraḥ sarasvatī sajoṣā mīḷhuṣmanto viṣṇur mṛḷantu vāyuḥ /
analyzed: te naḥ rudraḥ sarasvatī sajoṣāḥ mīḷhuṣmantaḥ viṣṇuḥ mṛḍantu vāyuḥ

original: RV_6,050.12c ṛbhukṣā vājo daivyo vidhātā parjanyāvātā pipyatām iṣaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ daivyaḥ vidhātā parjanyāvātā pipyatām iṣam naḥ

original: RV_6,050.13a uta sya devaḥ savitā bhago no 'pāṃ napād avatu dānu papriḥ /
analyzed: uta sya devaḥ savitā bhagaḥ naḥ pām napāt avatu dānu papriḥ

original: RV_6,050.13c tvaṣṭā devebhir janibhiḥ sajoṣā dyaur devebhiḥ pṛthivī samudraiḥ //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā devebhiḥ janibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ dyauḥ devebhiḥ pṛthivī samudraiḥ

original: RV_6,050.14a uta no 'hir budhnyaḥ śṛṇotv aja ekapāt pṛthivī samudraḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ śṛṇotu ajaḥ eka pād pṛthivī samudraḥ

original: RV_6,050.14c viśve devā ṛtāvṛdho huvānā stutā mantrāḥ kaviśastā avantu //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ huvānāḥ stutāḥ mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ avantu

original: RV_6,050.15a evā napāto mama tasya dhībhir bharadvājā abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
analyzed: eva napātaḥ mama tasya dhībhiḥ bharadvājāḥ abhī arcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_6,050.15c gnā hutāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭā viśve stutāso bhūtā yajatrāḥ //
analyzed: gnāḥ hutāsaḥ vasavaḥ dhṛṣṭāḥ viśve stutāsaḥ bhūtāḥ yajatrāḥ

original: RV_6,051.01a ud u tyac cakṣur mahi mitrayor āṃ eti priyaṃ varuṇayor adabdham /
analyzed: ud u tyad cakṣuḥ mahi mitrayoḥ ām eti priyam varuṇayoḥ adabdham

original: RV_6,051.01c ṛtasya śuci darśatam anīkaṃ rukmo na diva uditā vy adyaut //
analyzed: ṛtasya śuci darśatam anīkam rukmaḥ na divaḥ uditā vi adyaut

original: RV_6,051.02a veda yas trīṇi vidathāny eṣāṃ devānāṃ janma sanutar ā ca vipraḥ /
analyzed: veda yaḥ trīṇi vidathāni eṣām devānām janma sanutar ā ca vipraḥ

original: RV_6,051.02c ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyann abhi caṣṭe sūro arya evān //
analyzed: ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan abhi caṣṭe sūraḥ aryaḥ evān

original: RV_6,051.03a stuṣa u vo maha ṛtasya gopān aditim mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sujātān /
analyzed: stuṣe u vaḥ mahaḥ ṛtasya gopān aditim mitram varuṇam sujātān

original: RV_6,051.03c aryamaṇam bhagam adabdhadhītīn acchā voce sadhanyaḥ pāvakān //
analyzed: aryamaṇam bhagam adabdha dhītīn acchā voce sadhanyaḥ pāvakān

original: RV_6,051.04a riśādasaḥ satpatīṃr adabdhān maho rājñaḥ suvasanasya dātṝn /
analyzed: riśādasaḥ sat patīn adabdhān mahaḥ rājñaḥ su vasanasya dātṝn

original: RV_6,051.04c yūnaḥ sukṣatrān kṣayato divo nṝn ādityān yāmy aditiṃ duvoyu //
analyzed: yūnaḥ su kṣatrān kṣayataḥ divaḥ nṝn ādityān yāmi aditim duvoyu

original: RV_6,051.05a dyauṣ pitaḥ pṛthivi mātar adhrug agne bhrātar vasavo mṛḷatā naḥ /
analyzed: dyauḥ pitar pṛthivi mātar adruh agne bhrātar vasavaḥ mṛḍata naḥ

original: RV_6,051.05c viśva ādityā adite sajoṣā asmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yanta //
analyzed: viśve ādityāḥ adite sajoṣāḥ asmabhyam śarma bahulam vi yanta

original: RV_6,051.06a mā no vṛkāya vṛkye samasmā aghāyate rīradhatā yajatrāḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ vṛkāya vṛkye samasmai aghāyate rīradhata yajatrāḥ

original: RV_6,051.06c yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā rathyo nas tanūnāṃ yūyaṃ dakṣasya vacaso babhūva //
analyzed: yūyam hi stha rathyaḥ naḥ tanūnām yūyam dakṣasya vacasaḥ babhūva

original: RV_6,051.07a mā va eno anyakṛtam bhujema mā tat karma vasavo yac cayadhve /
analyzed: mā vaḥ enaḥ anya kṛtam bhujema mā tat karma vasavaḥ yat cayadhve

original: RV_6,051.07c viśvasya hi kṣayatha viśvadevāḥ svayaṃ ripus tanvaṃ rīriṣīṣṭa //
analyzed: viśvasya hi kṣayatha viśva devāḥ svayam ripuḥ tanvam rīriṣīṣṭa

original: RV_6,051.08a nama id ugraṃ nama ā vivāse namo dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām /
analyzed: namaḥ id ugram namaḥ ā vivāse namaḥ dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_6,051.08c namo devebhyo nama īśa eṣāṃ kṛtaṃ cid eno namasā vivāse //
analyzed: namaḥ devebhyaḥ namaḥ īśe eṣām kṛtam cit enaḥ namasā vivāse

original: RV_6,051.09a ṛtasya vo rathyaḥ pūtadakṣān ṛtasya pastyasado adabdhān /
analyzed: ṛtasya vaḥ rathyaḥ pūta dakṣān ṛtasya pastyasadaḥ adabdhān

original: RV_6,051.09c tāṃ ā namobhir urucakṣaso nṝn viśvān va ā name maho yajatrāḥ //
analyzed: tām ā namobhiḥ uru cakṣasaḥ nṝn viśvān vaḥ ā name mahaḥ yajatrāḥ

original: RV_6,051.10a te hi śreṣṭhavarcasas ta u nas tiro viśvāni duritā nayanti /
analyzed: te hi śreṣṭha varcasaḥ te u naḥ tiras viśvāni duritā nayanti

original: RV_6,051.10c sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agnir ṛtadhītayo vakmarājasatyāḥ //
analyzed: su kṣatrāsaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ ṛta dhītayaḥ vakma rāja satyāḥ

original: RV_6,051.11a te na indraḥ pṛthivī kṣāma vardhan pūṣā bhago aditiḥ pañca janāḥ /
analyzed: te naḥ indraḥ pṛthivī kṣāma vardhan pūṣā bhagaḥ aditiḥ pañca janāḥ
